Very good detail shots (better to take them from a yard/meter away and then use zoom than position the camera too close)3. Microphone is pretty good for instructional video.4. Lots of settings (they can be confusing but once understood they can help to correct lighting or adjust a bit to movement).Down sides:1. Moving people on stage are more than a small camera like this is made for. The best one I had for this was, believe it or not, the Kodak I had in late 2004 which had a "sports" setting and not as many megapixels. I do get good shots with this but need to take about 10-12 photos that blur before I get one good one. It does help to hold the button halfway down to focus ahead of the time you actually click it down for the exposure.2. Playback of the video has no sound/speaker. You can see it play back but to listen you need to put the file on another gizmo.3. I was using avidemux to edit my videos from the previous Canon I had. This one uses a "better" newfangled format even when not at highest definition, and it makes editing the file in Avidemux choppy and impossible to finesse. Big disappointment.4. I set up the camera one day to record my mother teaching a group of people, then went to listen with the rest of them. At the point where the video file reaches a certain file size, it stops and saves. You have to then restart recording a new file, losing some content. I didn't realize this so I lost a bunch of her talk. :-{ Next time I may try a lower resolution to get more time before the recording stops.I read enough reviews to be sure to get the SanDisk Extreme SDHC UHS-1 Class 10 Memory Card B004P1V8TM to go with it. I'm happy with that choice.

Reviews.Title: i like it
Reviews.Author: Zipporah
Reviews.Content: its not a bad camera, I still get blurry photos though. I would recommend it, it worth what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Great P&S; camera that takes outstanding macro shots!
Reviews.Author: TRJ
Reviews.Content: I LOVED this camera. Carried it all over the world with me last year. Looked to buy another one before this one's warranty ran out, but now they are more expensive than when I bought this one? Shot times are slow with flash, it takes a while to lock on or charge so forget trying to get quick, action shots with this one. At least not with flash. Otherwise it's acceptable. Awesome video too!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Point & Shoot Camera
Reviews.Author: M. Bulington "Indybug"
Reviews.Content: Got this for my son who is an exchange student in Japan.  He has taken some amazing pictures with it. It is small and easy to carry around with him, the battery life is good and the picture quality is great.  Being a teenager, he loves to use all the special effects and take lots of videos.  The slow motion video is one of his favorite things.  He has made some great vlog posts about his trip from videos he took on the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Dr. Rob
Reviews.Content: This replaced my previous Elph which drowned. I forgot digital cameras can't swim in the ocean. Oh my...This produces a GREAT picture quality (I've blown up photos to 20 inches with no pixelation at all), has a host of settings and features that makes it an impressive tool for capturing images in different lighting and locations (beach, mountain skiing, etc).It charges well, and the retracting lens makes it very small and easy to carry in your pocket. I have a carrying case for extra batteries and memory cards, but when on vacation, I carry it around without the pouch. Just be careful in the sand.Canon PowerShots have received rave reviews, and this one falls in line with the rest of the family exactly as it should. If I ever need a new camera, I'm looking at the PowerShot line again.I LOVE everything about this camera. I really do. So will you.

Reviews.Title: All good.
Reviews.Author: Boris Lozovskiy
Reviews.Content: All is well. This product fits the description. The quality is excellent. Recommend for purchase. Happy new year ! !

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: colbi
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a first time Digital user ( Grandma ) very easy to use and have had many great pictures to share with friends and family

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot for everyone
Reviews.Author: CK
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my parents who just want to be able to take great pictures without too much tinkering, and the little guy does the trick. They have traveled all over the world and taken great pictures with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, easy to use.
Reviews.Author: Esther Dornhelm
Reviews.Content: This camera delivers as it advertises. The camera is easy to use and has shown no problems since purchased 6 months ago.

Reviews.Title: very good camera
Reviews.Author: C. Ayala "nuto"
Reviews.Content: It takes great picture the settings are easy to used and control, Oh the video is great it record high definition video i believe 720p and  the file are quite large for that reason but you can set it for lower resolution too.  The sound on recording is decent, the picture a good,  I like it so far.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Jack Hawthorne
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, carry and have around. It is a camera for the pocket or the glove compartment to catch that shot that used to get away.

Reviews.Title: Super Camera
Reviews.Author: R. L. Shorb
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mother and she has loved it--great pictures--great price and super delivery time-- Mom takes her camera in to Walgreens for printed pictures when she wants them and stores lots on the camera to share with friends and family--great to fit in her purse

Reviews.Title: very satisfied with my purchase..
Reviews.Author: Raj
Reviews.Content: great buy. I have been using this for a year now and have had consistent quality pictures. I have used it for vacations, dd and ds school events. I even printed a couple of 8x10 pictures which turned out to be awesome.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Bryan Hightower
Reviews.Content: I like my little point and shoot Canon.  I've taken some really good pics from this camera.  It has video capability, but I don't use it very often, as I have better options available to me.  It's a Canon, it's well made, and it does exactly what you want it to do.  I'd highly recommend this camera to anyone wanting a nice, pocket point and shoot camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, amazing quality!
Reviews.Author: Daniel Miller
Reviews.Content: I use this camera as a vogging camera everyday on YouTube! It does 1080P and has no issues at all, and it gets thrown around in my bag all of the time. I've had it almost a year now. I love it! If you want to see the great quality it does search for danielxmiller on YouTube, my vlogging videos I use this camera. My professional videos I use a Sony NEX-5N. But that is too big to carry around, so I got this amazing little guy. It does 24 FPS which is great for regular videos.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera for every day use
Reviews.Author: Shawphi
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a friend's baby shower since she came to me asking what would be the best camera for her growing family. I chose this one. After almost 8 months of using it she tells me she absolutely loves it and the pictures are crisp. Her favorite feature is the burst shot which quick takes a photo of her 2 younger kids who never sit still enough in 1 place to get a decent shot.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Nabys
Reviews.Content: I will buy again from this merchant. Further, and very important. Think Green, Please protect animals and plants, recycle everything you can, no littering and use it enough to completely finish any product. Transmit this message to others.Compraré nuevamente en este negocio.  adicionalmente, Piensa Verde, por favor protege a los animales y las plantas, recicla todo lo que puedas, no echar basura, usa todo hasta el final, transmite este mensaje a otros.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Auntwaxy
Reviews.Content: Love this camera. It takes great pictures and is small so it fits right in my purse. I love the idea that I do not have to buy batteries,(yes, the last digital I had used batteries). The zoom is pretty good. Now if you are looking for pictures that professionals take, you will not like this camera but for everyday photography, it's great.

Reviews.Title: Great, Easy to Use Point-and-Shoot
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is my fourth Canon. I stepped on one with a ski boot once and while the screen doesn't work, the pictures still turn out great. After that I had a Elph that I used for a field course in college. Well, it made it through the course and summer of rough hiking but it had issues after all the wear and drops. My next camera, I dropped on cement and cracked the screen. It too still worked and took great pictures. I have had this one for a little over a month and really enjoy it. It takes great pictures both indoor and outdoor. I can use it to do close-ups without a tripod or to capture my 11 month old (who is ALWAYS on the move). Video quality is excellent too.

Reviews.Title: Solid camera
Reviews.Author: Nori
Reviews.Content: This camera is pretty slow compared to my previous one (Casio High-speed Exilim), but I think the picture quality is a little better. The slim profile is very convenient as well.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: SkIan
Reviews.Content: Camera takes nice pictures and has easy features to use. The size fits well into my hand. If you are using a mount you can't access the SD card so make sure you have the battery and card in before mounting the camera, just a small annoyance.Some pictures are blurry, but when you get a good picture, they look really nice.

Reviews.Title: Amazing little camera
Reviews.Author: wile-e-coyote
Reviews.Content: Nice features and resolution for the price. It's very compact and has a very nice wide screen on the back. I got it for my wife who loves it and I end up using it quite a bit as well.We have about 4 canon's in our house for various purposes and this has become one of the two primary cameras used.

Reviews.Title: The capabilities of this camera have proven to be exceptional.  Love it!
Reviews.Author: D. L. Veator
Reviews.Content: I own a high-end Canon 5D but found it to be to cumbersome for trekking about the world.  I found this camera to have features that allow me to still be a photographer instead of being relegated to a snapshot taker.  The capabilities of this camera have proven to be exceptional.  Love it!

Reviews.Title: Great camera and great price!
Reviews.Author: Zena "Amy"
Reviews.Content: Canon rocks my socks off.  I have tried other camera's by other companies and they work, but none work to the clarity and amazing easiness as this little guy.  I could throw a bunch of camera terminology at you, but I don't really know it.  I know it takes awesome photos, it takes pictures quickly (no saying Cheese and waiting another 5-10 seconds for the camera to work), and it's super easy to go back and look at the pictures on your camera or load them onto a computer.  And, it fits in my pocket.  Amazing.

Reviews.Title: Great 1080p Camera for $112 shipped
Reviews.Author: M. Meyers
Reviews.Content: This camera is great! And it is only $112 shipped. Yes it was refurbished, but it's in great condition and it shoots 1080p video. How do you beat that?

Reviews.Title: Very nice little camera
Reviews.Author: Daniel1948
Reviews.Content: I really like this little camera. I'm not a serious photographer and I have no idea how to use the advanced functions. I do point-and-shoot, and this camera, which replaced an older PowerShot that did not have image stabilization, takes better pictures. I'm very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Slooooooooowest camera ever.
Reviews.Author: Laila "chef nerd"
Reviews.Content: Great optics, but extremely slow shudder! Do not buy this if you want to capture a toddler... Or any othe living thing, for that matter. Maybe a tree sloth. Really, I've never had a slower shutter on a camera. Very shocking for one of this quality. The lenses and screen were good though. And it was intelligent with faces and scenes.Biggest bust? And this might be just bad luck, but the screen on ours stopped working after just a few months :(

Reviews.Title: the best little D.C. on the market
Reviews.Author: Karl Hettmann
Reviews.Content: if you don not expect a little point and shoot to turn out results you only can expect froma a Pro-Outfit, then this is a great littlecamera. in this size you wo'nt find anything comparable on the market.Karl

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: ssantoro
Reviews.Content: Needed a medium priced camera for a trip to Italy, and this was the best buy!! Takes amazing pictures, awesome quaility and easy to use! I would highly recommend this camera to anyone who needs one!

Reviews.Title: Cannon does make usefull digital cameras
Reviews.Author: Richard J. Vielbig "One-who-enjoys-a-story-we...
Reviews.Content: I was looking for another digital camera to replace my "older" one which now is about ten years old. I based my decision on Consumer Reports reviews of this camera and decided that it would fill my needs.My only objection is when I tried to "thread" the hand "sling" through the place where it goes, it was very "frustrating". After many unsuccessful attempts, I finally succeeded.It did arrive well packed and in a timely manner.

Reviews.Title: Takes great pictures!
Reviews.Author: Rog
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, takes great photos and it very reasonably priced.  My son takes thousands of pictures and has had every camera imaginable and told me to this was the best one and I agree.

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: Compact, works great, and simple to use. I would buy another in a second. I have one, and we bought it for a retiring not tech savy co-worker. She uses it, and sends us pictures of her grandkids... Great purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great small camera!
Reviews.Author: Mina
Reviews.Content: Amazing camera ... nice price and fast delivery. Very happy with my purchaise and I am buying a second one for my sister just different colour... Recomended!

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be happier
Reviews.Author: Amanda Winstead
Reviews.Content: This camera takes incredible pictures and mind-boggling video for its price point. I used it extensively for underwater photography on vacation and was dazzled at the results. I don't see replacing this one any time soon.

Reviews.Title: Not as Good as My Last Canon
Reviews.Author: Angela D. Golish "Angie"
Reviews.Content: The pictures aren't as clear or as good of quality as the last Canon I bought, I'm not sure if it's the model or something else.  :(

Reviews.Title: Do not buy if you want to record videos
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Morris "Cakeisalye"
Reviews.Content: Returned once for clicking sound when zooming in with video clips, received second one with the same issue. Upon speaking to Canon customer support it is 'normal' for this to occur on the camera and not a defect by any means. I'm shocked that this got through the quality assurance department without anyone picking up on this.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Eli Martin
Reviews.Content: I love Canon products, and this little digital guy is awesome.  It's not too expensive, but takes quality pictures and has a lot of settings to choose from.  Every now and again, it doesn't seem to want to focus properly in certain lightings, but overall it's a great digital camera for someone (like me) who wants a good camera to capture everyday life but isn't necessarily making a career out of it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Photo Quality, Wonderful Wide Angle
Reviews.Author: Dan B "Dan"
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. It captures excellent color and clarity and it does it all with a great wide angle. But even with the wide angle, you can get close ups done well too. I took some nice pictures of the wife up close and it was great. But I feel where this camera shines is in its ability to capture scenic vistas or situations where you need a lot if information in the photo - I also use it for an around town blog that I have and the picture quality is just extraordinary. It fits neatly into a shirt pocket too. A great little camera.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and good
Reviews.Author: Limar
Reviews.Content: Easy to carry, good quality, I bought this little guy to my granny, and she loves it. Easy to use. Recommend if u planning to buy a gift. Not expensive, but not the bad.

Reviews.Title: Small camera nice pictures
Reviews.Author: James Ouimet
Reviews.Content: I got this for my wife. She has gotten some very nice pictures with it. Some times better than my big DSLR.

Reviews.Title: Best small camera I've ever owned.
Reviews.Author: Keith Hunziker
Reviews.Content: I am an advanced amateur with over 40 years experience.  The Elph 110 is a wonderful addition to my Canon 5D, mk II.  Pictures are extremely sharp and color saturation is excellent.  Easily slips into a shirt or pants pocket for immediate availability.  Program options offer many creative choices.  Image stabilization plays a huge role in picture sharpness from a small camera.  Most recently used it for cockpit scenic shots from a DeHaviland Beaver floatplane as we flew over and around Lake Chelan.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, short battery life
Reviews.Author: Guilherme Pianetti "Gravedigger"
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the day to day point and shoot kind of pictures. A lot of functionalities and good picture quality.The downfall is the short battery life, and a new battery costs 50 bucks!!

Reviews.Title: This is a good camera
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: I have had it for six months now and it takes excellent pictures I want to get another soon! I do plan in the future to purchase another battery because the battery does go down fast if you are taking alot of pictures at one time like I do if I go somewhere so a back-up battery is necessary for me. It takes very good quality videos as well. I have dropped the camera many times, no damage execpt for I dropped it on rocks and cracked the screen.I would recommend this to any body looking for a good point-and-shoot

Reviews.Title: Bought for Interior Real Estate Pics
Reviews.Author: JessieBee
Reviews.Content: Happy with the wide angle ability....but should have bough a case to protect.It is very light weight & fragile. The Lens cover stopped closing after a few uses. I feel I have to be overly careful with the camera for longevity. Expected a bit more sturdy for the price.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 110 HS 16.1 MP
Reviews.Author: J. L. Murphy
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera to take on a trip with a group of people, best camera I have owned, small enough to put in a pocket or small purse, screen is wide angle you can get an excellent shot of anything you take, recommend it highly.

Reviews.Title: Third Time is a Charm!
Reviews.Author: H. Wheales
Reviews.Content: I own a Canon DSLR and love it, but...it is in some ways, an inconvenient camera. I have lugged it up mountain trails, packed it into waterproof bags and taken it downstream, and missed lots of shots while tugging it out. I won't leave it on a kitchen counter or table to be grabbed in the moment because it cost way too much money to risk damage.I realized, while noting that everyone is capturing every moment on their smartphone cameras, that I am missing out. So, I bought an ELPH 110, which I proceeded to somehow lose on my first hike with it. SO, I came right back to Amazon and shelled out the money for another...and a better case, with a carbiner clip.That was in May 2013...and that camera was wonderful. I captured images and video of my kids' kindergarten and 8th grade graduations that was, at least aesthetically, as good as my DSLR--it certainly captured more light in low-light settings. The video feature is great; I loaded clips easily onto a DVD, and made some memorable summer films. I took neat nature shots with the macro lens, experimented with the B&W; and color saturation features, and logged a daily vacation journal with crisp, clear photos. I carried it in my purse and left it on the kitchen counter--it has served exactly the purpose I intended and more. Then, while rushing to get outside and take a photo of a friend goofing off,  I dropped it on a hardwood floor--hard. Cracked the screen, jammed the lens. There is no fixing this mess.  UGH.So, I logged onto Amazon and bought another. I've now spent as much on these as I have my DSLR body. I just thought that this illustrates that his camera is worth buying again...and again...and again.

Reviews.Title: Happy with my purchase, it met my expectations
Reviews.Author: Michael C. McCullough
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a replacement for a digital Elph that I had lost.  I use this camera for general purpose photography both indoors and outdoors for situations such as family events, vacation, or outdoor activities.For the most part this camera met all my needs and expectations for a simple point-and-shoot camera.  As a previous ELPH owner, it was really easy for me to come up to speed on this camera.  The picture quality is good.The only detraction that I notice is it is a bit slow, especially in low light.  In a recent indoor family event I missed a few shots due to the speed of the camera.Overal I would recommend this camera for someone looking for a simple point-and-shoot camera for general usage.

Reviews.Title: Decent basic digital camera
Reviews.Author: Sara B Garro
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace my old digital elph. (It was old school and took the best macro photos!)I'm a fan of canon products and this one is, as my review title suggests:Decent basic digital camera.Nothing too fancy and all the functions are straightforward.That said, there's nothing particularly special about this camera.Sometimes the photo quality is exceptional. Other times, eh. The macro function is eh.One gripe I have with this camera is an occasional slow response time to taking a photo.Usually, I take a lot of photos, so even that problem doesn't stop me from getting the shot I want.

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: terry spink
Reviews.Content: Have not used all the features , but am very pleased with those I have used. Very good stills and wonderful video. Would not expect anything less from canon.

Reviews.Title: love this product
Reviews.Author: desiree carman
Reviews.Content: I recieved this camera for christmas it is great quality and works wonderful. Uploads easy and i love the color .

Reviews.Title: love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Kayla8122
Reviews.Content: Awesome camera.. I bought it for my vacation to the Bahamas and it took AMAZING pictures. Way better than my older sony cybershot. GREAT camera!

Reviews.Title: Impressed by size, performance, and so far, the durability
Reviews.Author: PBecks
Reviews.Content: I have had a few canon point and shoot cameras. This has the most MP @ 16.1, good 5x zoom, and excellent tracking. I would recommend Canon; I have yet to be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy!
Reviews.Author: michael paniagua
Reviews.Content: In my opinion for a smaller point and shoot camera you cannot complain much about this camera. Has a nice LCD screen in back, I prefer buttons over touch screen so this is what I was looking for. Starts up rather quick, video is full HD and records better than my HTC One X. Images from this camera are bright, crisp and look good at full 16MP. Compared to my older 1100 Elph this camera has far superior image stabilization. I like the active IS when in video mode too.Overall the complaints of this camera are what people always complain about with point and shoots, in my opinion. In dark environments at high ISO the images are noisy and bad. Of course.My only complaint, I wish I had the option for manual settings on this camera. Not shutter, Aperture or full manual... just "P" mode.

Reviews.Title: Lens won't retract
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: Camera is a delightful design but the lens stopped retracting and the camera is useless.My grandson brought this on our vacation, unfortunately!

Reviews.Title: Beautiful camera
Reviews.Author: Ivo Lovo
Reviews.Content: This camera was very nice, i relly recomended to buy it the lcd panel was very good and the picture is very good

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Santosh
Reviews.Content: I liked this product very well. Excellent product, I will suggest to my friends strongly. Picture quality is excellent, very good performance

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted.
Reviews.Author: Sally Williams
Reviews.Content: Looking for a small, easy to carry camera and easy to operate.  Found this, and am very happy with it.  I would recommend it.  Does help if you have small fingers, which I do, the buttons are small.

Reviews.Title: Getting hard to find, worth it.
Reviews.Author: SKinnell
Reviews.Content: This camera is so conveniently small and simple to use that I have completely abandoned my EOS Rebel DSLR. I've been at locations where I've shot with both cameras, and the ELPH 110 takes much sharper, better pictures, so why carry the extra baggage? I've even started taking it with me to libraries instead of my hand-held scanner--it's smaller, the battery lasts longer, and I can instantly see my documents in high detail. The video capability is very impressive for such a small camera. The only flaw: when using the zoom feature while taking video, a humming noise is recorded on the video soundtrack.

Reviews.Title: Does what it should
Reviews.Author: Boothill
Reviews.Content: Great little camera. It takes decent video and good pictures. Easily fits in the pocket. Durability seems good. Get an extra battery for it for when it does run out although battery life is good.

Reviews.Title: Wife's Camera
Reviews.Author: Floyd O. Powers Jr.
Reviews.Content: She loves it. She was a little hesitant at first because it has so many features. She loves the HD videos and the pictures have been outstanding. Purchased a Canon Pixma MX922 so that I can print my own pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for an amatuer.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I would have given it 5 stars if the battery life wasn't so poor. Nonetheless, it is a great camera. Takes great pictures, lightweight, many different features I am sure will be useful when I finally read about them, and lastly, it's easy enough to navigate.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Donald Helsel
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for the point and shoot user. It does everything promised. I have only taken 400-500 photos so far, but it has not let me down yet. I do a lot of ATV riding so will have to see how it manages the dusty conditions. Will up date at the end of the riding year.

Reviews.Title: great pocket camera
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Eric Carlson
Reviews.Content: this takes nice pictures and is easy to use and easy to carryI am also pleased with the HD video

Reviews.Title: It's GREAT!
Reviews.Author: John Economidis
Reviews.Content: I have loved everything about this camera.  Small, convenient, full of features.  It was an excellent choice.  Would buy it again!

Reviews.Title: Small best thing!
Reviews.Author: Gisela Tong
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to use. So far I only have used the Auto setting and pictures came out GREAT! Easy set and transfer pics to my Mac computer. Can't wait to figure out what more this camera has in store.

Reviews.Title: Great camera.
Reviews.Author: Joyce
Reviews.Content: This camera takes such great pictures that I purchased one for my grown son, and one for my grown daughter.  They both have a young child, so they use it a lot.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing but passable camera
Reviews.Author: cxp
Reviews.Content: I am a Canon DSLR user who wanted to purchase a point and shoot for my wife and to keep in my pocket for trips where I didn't feel like carrying my camera.  I have used three Canon PowerShot models since 2003, and I figured that the recent PowerShots would be a great choice.My biggest complaint is that there is no quick way to delete pictures without clicking through a menu.  On all previous PowerShots, there was a dedicated delete button.  Not anymore.  (unless I'm missing it?)Image quality is average and usability is worse than my older PowerShot SD1000.  My wife has used the camera a few times to take pictures of our one year old daughter.  I continue to prefer taking my older Canon XS DSLR paired with a 50mm f/1.8 prime.  If I need a quick snapshot, I have an iPhone in my pocket at all times.  I've taken a few pictures and videos with this camera, but I find myself constantly going back to my DSLR.  I want photographs, not snapshots.I have taken a few good pictures and videos with this camera, but overall, I'm unsatisfied.  If I had to purchase again, I would look at a ruggedized, waterproof camera.  I have an iPhone for taking everyday snapshots -- a waterproof point and shoot would let me go places that are normally off limits.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: r brooding "r brooding"
Reviews.Content: First, the only complaint I have is where the flash is placed. Super annoying to have to remember "the flash will come out of here, move your finger." But aside from that, great camera. Zoom is incredible. Crisp video and pictures. My wife specifically asked for this camera, and her mom bought one as well based on my wife's recommendations (props where they are deserved), glad we bought it!

Reviews.Title: Nice camara
Reviews.Author: MORALES Albert
Reviews.Content: It is a really good camara.  Pictures very clear, bright color.  It is compact and meets very well its funtion.  The only thing i dont like is that the navegation keybord is too little, if you have big fingers its might be annoying.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: T. Cummings
Reviews.Content: This camera is very light and small.  Perfect for travel.  And it takes great pictures and the battery life is great.  I've had it for over a month and I have not had to charge the battery again beyond the initial charge.

Reviews.Title: Good pics
Reviews.Author: BinkaBoo "bogiesfedora"
Reviews.Content: The only time I haven't gotten good pics with this camera is when I accidently didn't have the AUTO on. Without the auto my pics were blurry and terrible. On AUTO everything comes out great. It's lightweight and pretty, I keep it in my purse to take random pictures of my kid.

Reviews.Title: Nice compact camera
Reviews.Author: tmac
Reviews.Content: I usually use a Canon 7d for photos but that can be a tad bulky at times.  Was in the need for a pocket sized camera and this is perfect for that.  Quality of the photos are really crisp. Very easy to use and has so e great features.  Battery life is decent but I got the extra battery anyway.  Great little camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice size
Reviews.Author: Sandra T. Seiler
Reviews.Content: Great little camera, perfect size to fit in your pocket and takes great pictures. Price wasn't bad either and it got good reviews from previous owners

Reviews.Title: As promised
Reviews.Author: fbfanatic
Reviews.Content: my wife loves the camera...it is small, easy to carry and takes great pictures. She loves the ease of use of the camera, and the quality of pictures!

Reviews.Title: Solid Camera Survives Noob repair after being dropped while on
Reviews.Author: dad
Reviews.Content: The camera takes great pictures and movies.We dropped the camera while it was on and got a "Lens Errors", ripped it all apart and was able to push the lens back into place. I'm absolutely amazed that the "ripping" it apart didn't destroy it. I had figured we had nothing to lose trying to fix it so I wasn't as gentle/patient I could have been. I'm glad I didn't give up trying to fix it as I got the camera for 140 and they are selling now for 200. I don't believe Canon is making more of these.If you break yours it may be worth trying to fix. You'll need some P-00 and P-000 screwdrivers.

Reviews.Title: cam
Reviews.Author: MAKEYA STEWART
Reviews.Content: nice & compact & gets the job done...Not too big not to complicated to use. great value for the price

Reviews.Title: It is OK
Reviews.Author: ChaeYoung Lee
Reviews.Content: This is my first canon product and so far so good.Battery is okay for a day!Worth for money!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: katina Johnson
Reviews.Content: works great, great pictures, small and compactI enjoy having a tiny camera to carry in my pocket that also takes great pictures. Battery holds a charge well.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: drw920
Reviews.Content: Chose the camera based on good reviews and reasonable price. Was a serious upgrade from our crummy Nikon with touch screen. Pictures come out clear and we love all the settings and features. Great camera!

Reviews.Title: Warped images
Reviews.Author: Allie
Reviews.Content: For all intents and purposes, this is an okay camera that will do what it is meant to do. Unfortunately, a lot of the images have a warp to them that I just can't seem to get rid of; almost like a fish-eye lens. It's problematic when it comes to shooting portraits, especially. Overall, not something I would purchase again.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: J. Williams
Reviews.Content: Purchased for new parents, this camera is perfect. Really excellent quality pictures and great features including being able to take a rapid succesion of pictures . They are thrilled with it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Hilda B. Pomares
Reviews.Content: For the price it is unbeatable.  Takes very nice pictures and is very easy to work with.  Might not be a professional grade one but it is a great one for the amateur.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Carol Ann Moir "happy camper"
Reviews.Content: Sharp pictures, easy to use, large window,  offers lovely colors like the green though we picked the silver for my Mother. She is not a savvy camera person, simple is the word,  perfect  item to fit in her pocket or small purse. The camera arrived on time and she is very pleased. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Delay in picture taking
Reviews.Author: Donna Zawistowski
Reviews.Content: shutter time is too long after you click the picture.  You then end up with a blurred picture.Shutter time needs to be much quicker.

Reviews.Title: Powershot ELPH 110 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: leroy walker
Reviews.Content: This item was purchased as a birthday git for father in law. Since he lives with us, I have had a chance to use it too and just love the resolution and ease of use that comes with it. I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great camera/ easy to use
Reviews.Author: michelle
Reviews.Content: I bought this Canon PowerShot for my trip to South America. I normally don't use cameras but I figure I would need one for this trip. It is really easy to use and a great size.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Barbara Heath
Reviews.Content: We've owned canon cameras for years.  This was mainly purchased for the color and for taking better pics than an iphone.

Reviews.Title: Great pocket camera
Reviews.Author: ljmiii
Reviews.Content: This is a great pocket camera.  Though I use Nikon's digital SLRs (and film SLRs before that), Canon's pocket digital's can't be beat.  I bought this for my daughter and for her this one hits a sweet spot of small size, low price, and point-and-shoot functionality.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Elina
Reviews.Content: It's very intuitive! I like the quality of the pictures! This product is very good and the price is perfect. I would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: superior to contemporary rivals
Reviews.Author: boudu
Reviews.Content: 16MP allows one to crop while retaining good resolution.good exposure range, details retained, and colours good. good low light.

Reviews.Title: flimsy
Reviews.Author: marilyn freundlich
Reviews.Content: i bought this camera to replace my power shot sd 790 is which my kind husband dropped and literally broke in two pieces.  this camera is flimsier and looks like a toy camera.  maybe i need to get used to it but so far, i am not convinced.

Reviews.Title: Wife loves it..
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: Got it for my wife as a gift.  She loves it..  It's pretty quick and we like the HD  movie taking option.

Reviews.Title: Really good
Reviews.Author: elminster21
Reviews.Content: This camera is really good. The size is perfect. Nothing tricky of complicated to setup. You will not go wrong with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: D. Campbell "donnabellee"
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures. Very easy to use. lots of choices to get just the type of picture you want. I am thrilled with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Loyal Canon Camera Customer
Reviews.Author: F. Hamaday "grand mom"
Reviews.Content: I have always purchased Canon digital cameras in the past and have extremely good experiences with them.I take a lot of photos and I really love the Canon 110 HS

Reviews.Title: My eighth
Reviews.Author: Upsand Downs
Reviews.Content: My wife and I have eight or so Canon digital cameras and I bought this for a vacation to Hawaii because I didn't want to fool around with an SLR. It works flawlessly and you have to look very hard to see any difference between the photos it takes and the ones my Canon SLR takes.

Reviews.Title: Great Point and Shoot
Reviews.Author: Nic
Reviews.Content: Outside of the relatively hard to press buttons on the camera and the 10minute limit on video clips, there is nothing about this camera that I can fault. Pictures and video are absolutely perfect. Marco mode allows for great close ups and even at high ISO in low light, the pictures taken come out with little noise.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: FLOFCT
Reviews.Content: Nice compact size, takes very good photos.The video are not great but very good for this price range.This camera is not as good as my older 12mp digital SLR but very close. Nice all around carry camera

Reviews.Title: This camera is amazing for the price. Photos are brilliant and video is spectacular.
Reviews.Author: ceeamerica
Reviews.Content: Perfect for carrying everywhere, light, small and packs a punch. Brilliant 16MP photos and 1080P clear video. This camera is meant to take pictures of a close environment and it does that very nice. I use my SX40HS for things far away. What a team, thank you Canon.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: megwa
Reviews.Content: I got this camera right before I went to my trip to Portugal and it perfect for me. Typical point and shoot but fast and lots of other options.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 110 surpasses my expectaions
Reviews.Author: Tyler Cooper
Reviews.Content: I have been completely satisfied with my purchase of the Canon PowerShot. I am a frequent family photographer and take a variety of shots including stills, landscapes, and video. The Canon PowerShot has performed magnificiently for me in each of my scenarios. There is a small amount of sound during video shooting when the lense is going thru the zooming motion, but aside from that small issue I have seen its features as flawless.I purchased this camera after a previous pocket camera I owned gave out. I was hesitant in buying a point and shoot to replace it, but I am convinced that I no longer need a pocket camera as this device meets all of my needs.I am a huge fan of this camera and am thrilled at its value to me as a consumer.

Reviews.Title: A really great camera
Reviews.Author: Essie
Reviews.Content: This camera has a lot of great options. It may take me awhile to learn all the functions, but so far I love it. You don't have to learn all the options but there is sure a lot you can do with this camera. Black & white, or sepia tones, slow-mo video, framing, etc. My son now wants to buy one. He thought his Iphone had great pics until he saw this camera.

Reviews.Title: An outstanding pocket digital camera
Reviews.Author: Jack G.
Reviews.Content: This is an outstanding pocket digital camera and has far exceeded my expectations for it.  I have an earlierELPH 750 camera and have thoroughly enjoyed it.  This one takes it to a new level.

Reviews.Title: my taughts on the canon elph 110 hs
Reviews.Author: kevin
Reviews.Content: its small very light weight affordable in price and take really good pics its perfect for a gift to someone or for personal use

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot camera.
Reviews.Author: Greg J
Reviews.Content: Love the 16 mp and sharp pictures I get with this. This is my first Canon and I am pretty impressed. I also own a Nikon D5000, so I know a little bit about cameras, but I am not a pro by any means and give it 5 stars because it does what I want well. The camera is on and snapping photos fairly quick, view screen is awesome, taking videos is a snap and video quality is good.I have two children 2.5 and 5 years old - taking photos of them can be a pain, but the Canon has done a nice job and the only bad photos I got were in AUTO mode instead SPORT and the photo was blurry do to kids moving - my fault, not the camera. I would definitely recommend this camera for every day use in your pocket or purse and I use it on vacations for up close, but use my Nikon for specialty shots - landscapes, distant shots or birds with zoom lense. I found many reviews on websites compare this to a high end point and shoot - it does not have all the bells and whistles of a high end camera, but for the price and my needs it was a perfect fit.

Reviews.Title: Battery life weak
Reviews.Author: maria kim
Reviews.Content: It takes nice video but the battery doesn't last long at all...I have to charge the battery often when taking video...it's annoying to say the least. I would not repurchase it or recommend it for outside the home where there's no charging station cuz when you need the camera at the right moment the battery needs recharging...

Reviews.Title: Satisified with Camera
Reviews.Author: C. Mosby
Reviews.Content: I had been looking at this camera for quite a few months before deciding to purchase it. I had looked at several reviews on Amazon and other places and finally decided to make the purchase.  For me, the size is convenient and has enough features for my use.  I am not a professional and don't take a lot of pictures, but I like to have more than I need with certain electronics. The software with it is very useful in regards to pictures I already have on my computers.

Reviews.Title: Just got it
Reviews.Author: Shy_Anne
Reviews.Content: VERY disappointing! The picture quality is TERRIBLE! Please trust me and go with something else.. anything else! I am baffled that there are so many positive reviews... the pics look chalky and pixilated. Not to mention the camera feels like super cheap plastic... i had a canon a couple of years ago and it felt quality and took great pics... this IS NOT what I am used to :(

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera
Reviews.Author: Tim "Timdiana" Dunn
Reviews.Content: I've always been interested in the Canon PowerShot, and I'm pleased that I got it. This camera is great for any photographer, with it's terrific zooming capabilities and it's editing abilities. If you have the likes of New 32gb Micro Sd Card Sdhc Tf Flash Memory Card 32gb Class 10, New! Usa!, the you should be set when it comes to memory. Aside from, I can't think of a better camera to have around then this Canon.

Reviews.Title: I just keep upgrading!
Reviews.Author: Paul Havemann "umbrage at ambage"
Reviews.Content: This is my third, or fourth - I forget - ELPH camera; (I believe my first one boasted a whopping 2 megapixels.)  I've tried other brands, but keep coming back to Canon.I can't add much to what other reviewers have said, but I wish that the ELPH still used a sturdy metal case. (My SD1000 will attest to the need, given the dents it has collected over the years.)That said, though, they just keep improving the features. This one has facial recognition and other goodies which are now apparently standard, but new to me. The full HD video is a plus, too. The fact that I can whip it out, press the power button, and be clicking away in seconds is very nice for those unexpected moments.

Reviews.Title: Decent, but I expected better.
Reviews.Author: Miech
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera after my old Casio EXILIM camera took an unfortunate fall. Being several years later, I expected at least equal performance out of a Canon camera, but to my disappointment, I have to report that the old Casio took much better, crisper, and vivid photos than this Canon model.I admit, I'm not a professional photographer, so it's possible that there are settings or manual modes that can be applied to this camera to take fantastic photos, but if I wanted that level of granularity, I would have purchased a manual SLR.Overall I find the photos grainy, especially at higher resolutions. I think Canon may have made a poor choice in the CCD within this model or CCDs have pushed the megapixel envelope a bit too far too quickly.In the end, this does serve its purpose and I do still use it for my daily quick photos, but I do lament the loss of my old Casio camera.

Reviews.Title: It is the best camera ever.
Reviews.Author: Hossam Mikhail "el.hoss"
Reviews.Content: It is the best I love it. Works very good . I totally recommend it . It is so easy to navigate plus the pixs quality are so good. The price is amazing .

Reviews.Title: A quality digital camera that doesn't take forever to focus and shoot!
Reviews.Author: R. TRENT
Reviews.Content: I have had my Canon ELPH now for about 2 months and it has been an awesome camera.  The overall  picture quality is amazing:  the details are sharp and the colors are both vivid and true to life.  The best compliment I can give this camera is that it takes pictures that look like they are taken by a real photographer!I am also pleased with how small and easy to carry around it is.  I can just slip it in my purse or pocket (I did buy a CaseLogic case with clip attachment) and I have gotten so many more good on the spot pictures because of that.The one thing I most wanted was a faster focus-and-shoot.  I like to take pictures of animals and people and they dont always stay in perfect position!  Before I bought the Canon I had a basic Nikon Coolpix which was a nice enough camera that had good reviews, but it seemed you had to hold thefocus button halfway so long that my subjects would move just a bit - and the pictures would often end up a little blurred.I didn't  want to get a more sophisticated camera with the ability to change shutter speed - I wanted a no fuss point-and-shoot.  I kept looking through product reviews until I found the ELPH and I am so glad that I did the research!There are alot of excellent and thorough reviews on this camera (as well as about many other SLRs) on Amazon - and I read most of them! I appreciate the information they offered as they were helpful to me in making my decision so I wont try to repeat all the technical details.I just wanted to let potential buyers know that if they have been frustrated with unrealistic  focus and shoot results that the ELPH has worked out great for me and is a quality digital camera.  I hope this was helpful!.t

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I expected
Reviews.Author: Art 3
Reviews.Content: The description of this camera is spot on. It takes great pictures and you have many different options in the settings to change the colors, or distort the photos before you take them. This camera has great value for the price and it is small and compact. I highly recommend this.

Reviews.Title: I got more than my money's worth.
Reviews.Author: Henry G.
Reviews.Content: I am right in the middle of my vacation in the Kentucky mountains with my PowerShot. The pictures are clearer, the videos a crisper and the program that came with it has made downloading to the computer and then to FB a thousand times smoother. I am very well satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Won't be disappointed.
Reviews.Author: I. Marrero
Reviews.Content: My brother recommended this camera to me and he was right in the money.  It takes excellent picture and very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great as an always available camera for quick shots
Reviews.Author: sharkhunter55
Reviews.Content: Great camera.  I keep it in my shirt pocket for instant access.  Would recommend it to anyone who wants a camera always close by.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Hawkeye
Reviews.Content: I like the camera and it works really well. I gave it 4 stars because of the use of a battery which needs to be recharged. Seems all the manufacturers are doing this now so they can make more money. 2 AA batteries would be too simple.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Leza Cummins
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my sister for her birthday and she is absolutely thrilled with the ease of use and the quality of the pictures.  Some of the pictures she takes with it look like a professional did them.  Excellent buy.

Reviews.Title: good simple camera
Reviews.Author: C. KEEFE
Reviews.Content: this is a third camera for us from the Powershot family.  All cameras worked well with no issues.  Our last one lasted three years before it failed.  It took over 10K pics,  We expect this to last as good and better.  This is my wifes purse camera that comes out for events.  No issues, easy to use.  A must buy.

Reviews.Title: Nice size
Reviews.Author: Suereview
Reviews.Content: I like that I can grab this and put it in a clutch or even a pocket. This was a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: Jane Campbell
Reviews.Content: I took some interior shots with wide angle and they came out great.  That is main reason I bought this camera for the wide angle lens...

Reviews.Title: Like the wide angle function
Reviews.Author: leeng
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for the wide angle function.  Would have given 5 stars if the macro function wasn't so limited (close up focus blurs at less than 6 inches).

Reviews.Title: Love Canon PowerShot ELPH's
Reviews.Author: Mom to Jays
Reviews.Content: We recently lost our 6 year old ELPH on vacation and bought this as a replacement.  So far I'm happy with our purchase.  It's close enough to our old camera so as not to relearn how it works.  Pricing was the best that I found online.  It was out of stock but shipped by the date indicated.  Very happy with the pricing and shipping.  The camera is very nice looking.  It takes a little longer for the camera to actually take the picture but that may be due to the higher megapixels, not sure.  I'll report back once I've used it more but so far I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Canon powershot ELPH 110
Reviews.Author: Kent Marklund
Reviews.Content: I received this camera and after only 1 week, during which time I took about a dozen pictures, vertical lines appeared on the left side of the LCD screen unexplicable. They appear to have become permanent lines and they are there all the time the camera is on. Fortunately, the lines are only on the LCD screen and do not affect the pictures themselves, but they are definitely an annoyance. During my one week of using this camera I took the utmost care for it and these lines did definitely not appear there due to maltreatment. There is no information in the troubleshooting about this eitherI like everything else about the camera though.I would give it 5 stars if it was not for these lines on the left side of the screen - K.M

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: lwd850813
Reviews.Content: nice cam, small to carry when you want to travel. good picture quality, cannon is a good brand in cam.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Aleex
Reviews.Content: This camera is so amazing! It has a lot of features which what I was looking for. The battery doesn't seem to last so long but everything else is great.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Chelsea
Reviews.Content: Just what I thought it was going to be. (: Good quality pictures for the price and I like that the battery lasts awhile.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: VickiP
Reviews.Content: I picked the camera because it has one of the highest ratings. I really like my new camera. It takes nice, sharp pictures.

Reviews.Title: awsome camera
Reviews.Author: Mrs.Sullivan
Reviews.Content: Love this camera!!! So small good for travel ,takes awsome pics and the zoom is better then i thought . Took some pics at my daughters soccer game and they all came out great no blurry pics and great action shots ... So glad i bought this camera :)

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Germangirl
Reviews.Content: This is the 2nd camera we purchased. I bought one for myself and now for my daughter. Easy to use, small enough to carry anywhere. Video quality is amazing considering how small this camera is. Would recommend it very highly.

Reviews.Title: Best Point and Shoot Camera from Canon
Reviews.Author: Siddhu
Reviews.Content: Had this camera for a long  time and very much satisfied with pictures and videos. Super slow motion video is cool feature to have and creates awesome videos. :)

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 110 HS 16.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 5x Optical Image
Reviews.Author: Deb S.
Reviews.Content: The camera is light and sleek, takes a good quality picture, but it takes quit a while in between pictures. Takes a while for the camera to actually snap the picture, not quick at all, sometimes doesn't even get the picture if you don't hold down the button long enough. Tend to miss ALL the action shots, which is rather disappointing considering the price.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price and my needs
Reviews.Author: Damien P.
Reviews.Content: I'm not a photographer and wanted something better than my iPhone 5 camera when travelling. This camera does the job, great pictures to keep memories of trips. Very small in hands, some be careful not to drop it.

Reviews.Title: Takes amazing pictures...
Reviews.Author: Heather Eckels "H. Eckels"
Reviews.Content: I did some real research before purchasing this camera as a gift.  I use a Canon 20D and know a bit about cameras and functions. Having an easy to use camera was important to me and this was perfect.  It takes great pictures (amazing in fact) and is easy to use to download and share.  There are many functions and it has held up perfectly.  I would highly recommend it (in fact I want to repalce my point-n-shoot for when I can't carry my big camera)... I may have to buy one for myself!

Reviews.Title: Good poket camera for what I paid!
Reviews.Author: F. Ramirez
Reviews.Content: I paid $130 for the camera well worth it so far. So far so good! I have an old PowerShot SD750 Digital ELPH that I bought about 3 to 5 years ago it still works except is a 7.1 megapixel. I wanted something with more megapixels and the Canon PowerShot ELPH 110 HS fits the bill ($$$). I like it so far.

Reviews.Title: Great for vacations
Reviews.Author: JRF
Reviews.Content: I am a sucker for anything that is blue, and this color is light and fun to take on a vacation. The color makes it easy to find when tossed in luggage as well,

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Lee Wagar
Reviews.Content: My husband dropped my Canon ELPH630 and, well, that was the end of it!  Not a problem though as I had been desiring a new point and shoot with more megapixels.  After reading reviews and seeing the price, this was just what I wanted.  It is FAR superior to my old Canon!  The auto setting is wonderful....don't even need to set the macro manually for closeups.  Not one picture has come out blurry even with my shaking hands.  I LOVE this simple camera!

Reviews.Title: great camera at affordable price!
Reviews.Author: tmilleradmi
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use for great pictures and videos!  I like the zoom feature as well as the ease of recording videos and especially like the 1080p quality!

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Patricia A Dolan
Reviews.Content: I think I will love this camera the more I use it.  The compact size is great and it takes beautiful images.  Canon comes through again.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Devon
Reviews.Content: I took this on a beach vacation and I got some great pics, much better than the rest of the people with us. I actually have two of these because I thought I had lost the first one and decided to order the exact same camera. Good product for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: Pramod
Reviews.Content: This camera take great pic and video.  You need to work the features on it and it will take picture  as good as any SLR.  It takes a little bit of time between pictures but I don't know how that would be a problem.  For the price not much can beat that.  SLR's are great but you can't put that in your pocket and be very active with it.

Reviews.Title: Very Awesome Camera!
Reviews.Author: SpeakOfLove
Reviews.Content: This camera is the best camera I've ever owned. Good quality when it comes to taking pictures not to mention HD video. It's just amazing. I would recommend this to friends and family! Can't wait to take pictures with this camera when summer comes along!

Reviews.Title: Pretty good!
Reviews.Author: Carolina arce
Reviews.Content: This camera is AMAZING!!!! Super great ! Defiantly your money's worth. It's a great point and shoot camera. A very good camera if you use it to make YouTube videos. (What I do) anyone looking to get an easy to use, non expensive camera. THIS IS DEFINATLY FOR YOU!  The only bad thing about this camera would be that you hear a sound when you zoom in a video

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Krista Matsumoto
Reviews.Content: LOVE this camera for it's size and performance!  Photo quality was better than expected for what I paid for the camera.

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot Elph 110 HS
Reviews.Author: Birdman
Reviews.Content: Takes great photos and has lots of settings.  I wish that it would have come with an extra battery and SD card.

Reviews.Title: Great Point & Shoot Camera
Reviews.Author: Donna Blair
Reviews.Content: I really like the big screen for taking pictures and I love the fast shutter speed. Pictures are focused and sharp.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: erica kachinske
Reviews.Content: This camera is perfect. It takes great pictures, yet it is small enough to carry around easily. Great for traveling.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Branden J. Gary "Branden"
Reviews.Content: The headline pretty much says it all, I took this camera on a recent trip and it exceeded my needs and expectations :-D

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: C. Jackson
Reviews.Content: This is a perfect little camera to take on the go at a low low price.  I use it while running.

Reviews.Title: Pocket Rocket!
Reviews.Author: Wellard
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a "travel camera". it's small. it's light, it easy fits in a pocket and it takes amazing pictures.  It's packed with features, has amazing image quality and goes everywhere with me.  I love my DSLR, but the compactness and quality of this camera makes it hard to beat.

Reviews.Title: Problems with my Cannon PowerShot
Reviews.Author: J. Beaudoen "TRUE CRIME READER"
Reviews.Content: I received my camera without a battery. It clearly states that a battery is included in the box with all the other items that come with the camera. Amazon was no help at all and made false promises that a battery would be mailed overnight. It took about three days and the battery, although it worked, was of poor quality. I ordered, and had to pay for, a new battery. I was very disappointed with the shipment of the camera and very disappointed that Amazon was rather rude about my problem.

Reviews.Title: Great shots
Reviews.Author: Raintree
Reviews.Content: The first time I used this camera was at a friends wedding. A lot of the pictures were taken outside and I wasn't able to see what the pictures were going to look like. They all turned out amazing! I've purchased many digital cameras over the years and this is without a doubt the best one yet!

Reviews.Title: Dynamite Comes in Small Packages - Good Bargain
Reviews.Author: Heath Brownstead
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to record golf swings since it has the capability to capture slow motion video at 120 and 240 fps.  Although the shutter speed is not manually adjustable, the camera has the ability to shoot video at 1/2000 sec shutter speeds.  In bright sunlight, the camera will select the highest shutter speed and you will get very good quality video at 240 fps allowing you to see the shaft without blur.  On overcast days, the camera will select a slower shutter speed and you can get some blurring, but normally I am able to see what I need to see.  The video is easily edited right on the camera too which is a great feature, I can just cut and trim right on the screen.  The LCD is incredibly bright , easily viewable in direct sunlight.  The screen is quite large as well.  This camera is so small and light I keep it in a case in my golf bag.  I am very satisfied with the camera.

Reviews.Title: Broke already
Reviews.Author: Marla M. Russo "marlar"
Reviews.Content: I really like the size of the camera and it takes great pics, but after having it just a couple months, the top button piece that turns the camera on and off broke! :(

Reviews.Title: Pleased
Reviews.Author: Florence ODonovan
Reviews.Content: Great small pocket camera. Easy to use, excellent image quality, compact yet durable. Purchased based on Canon and Amazon web search. Compared features and benefits of like cameras.

Reviews.Title: Amazing product
Reviews.Author: Roe
Reviews.Content: This camera was suggested to me by my teacher. It was so worth the buy has great image quality and is very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot
Reviews.Author: Sheila K. Hollida
Reviews.Content: I really like my Canon Power Shot. Especially love the red. It takes beautiful pictures and is easy to use. I have previously owned Canon Power Shot cameras. It is compact and I can carry in my purse.

Reviews.Title: Great Quality
Reviews.Author: Ip Khera
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera the pics are just stunning. Sometimes hard to believe that this little camera can capture such vibrant and high quality pics. Gives users alot of control and also has a automatic function for noobs that just wanna take take great pics but aren't camera smart

Reviews.Title: Camera works good
Reviews.Author: irene marcellus
Reviews.Content: This camera works good. I had a dead battery and had top order more but if you don't put the battery in correctlythe camera will not work.

Reviews.Title: Great small camera
Reviews.Author: D Thompson
Reviews.Content: Got this for my wife for Christmas.  So far she hasn't found anything she doesn't like.  The battery life could be a little better though.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera!
Reviews.Author: J. Peters
Reviews.Content: Small, but powerful!  Great second camera for quick shots.  Fits in my pocket for easy access.  Excellent picture quality. Plus its a good value.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: angela arnold
Reviews.Content: Small, takes great pics even in low light, not at all hard to use as explained by some. just point click and boom good pics! good battery life. would purchase again, just wish I would have gotten in pink although black is ok too :0)

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Stacy
Reviews.Content: I found that this is exactly what I was looking for in a camera. It takes high qulity pictures and video!

Reviews.Title: I'm Happy So Far - Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Art Enthusiast
Reviews.Content: I've only had it two days, but so far am very satisfied.  I've taken several test pictures indoor hand held without a flash in different levels of lighting with and without zoom.  I'm well satisfied with the clarity.I wanted a point and shoot camera that would take good pictures in a variety of lighting situations.  It does what I wanted it to do.There are a number of manual settings, but I haven't done any checking on that.

Reviews.Title: The best take it with you camera.
Reviews.Author: Otto Schaefer
Reviews.Content: I have several cameras but this is one that you will not leave behind.  Great camera at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Great Price
Reviews.Author: Baby Bear
Reviews.Content: Ease of use; photos are sharp; colors are bright; easy to transfer to computer.  Will take on vacation this month where I will find out how great it is when I take over 500 pictures.  Easily carried in my purse or my husband's shirt pocket - a real plus.

Reviews.Title: canon powershot camera
Reviews.Author: Barton Marcum
Reviews.Content: This camera is great for the price. It takes sharp pictures at very close range. The HD video is also very nice. No problems with this camera.

Reviews.Title: THE EASIEST...AND I'M 60
Reviews.Author: Sally A. Schrum
Reviews.Content: Couldn't possibly be easier to operate.  I take pictures of my local area on a daily basis and have found so many things that I had previously missed..Even the Moose look better...

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: xuan
Reviews.Content: the color is bright and just like what it shows onlinethe functions work well and I usually tke it out when I was traveling

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: JennyF
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mom for Xmas.  It was a great price and very easy to use (my mom is not too savvy with electronics).  I would recommend.

Reviews.Title: It's small and nice
Reviews.Author: amy
Reviews.Content: It's quite comfortable in hand and really nice.A pocket is good enough to hold it.Good for this price.

Reviews.Title: Great color
Reviews.Author: CM
Reviews.Content: I am very hard on cameras.  I dropped them a lot in the sand, water, and on the floor.  I tend to go thru cameras fast.  This camera is very sturdy on the outside.  The body is hard, and the color is cool.  I think I may have found the camera for me.  Very easy to operate. Time will tell.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Just Me "Miss P"
Reviews.Content: I've read the other reviews and while I admit I'm not one of those people who know everything about cameras, this camera is great! The flash is excellent. Pictures taken in low light come out clear as day. I've taken some where the TV is on in the background and you can actually see what's on. My one complaint is the computer software that comes with it can be difficult to work and understand and half the photos I try to upload to Facebook from the program fail with no explanation. But the camera itself works great. My husband even dropped it (the battery popped out and everything) and it still works fine!

Reviews.Title: Great camera.
Reviews.Author: Piano
Reviews.Content: This camera is light weight and easy to use. It is small enough to carry in a purse or case.

Reviews.Title: Great Canon
Reviews.Author: Lynnita N Little
Reviews.Content: This is a great easy to use point and shoot camera. We also own a Canon 60d as well as a Canon Rebel. I like how stream line and small the ELPH 110 is. It takes clear photos with no fuss. When I need a quick and easy shot I use it or my I phone. No complaints. Worth the price. The black is classic and my number one pick. I would recommend it as a quick shot for any beginner or professional photographer.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera.A little small for Seniors
Reviews.Author: JAN E LES "janemin"
Reviews.Content: Really liked this camera except it was a little too small for my fingers to operate.I didnt have it more than a month or two when i loaned it to my grandson & he managed to lose it.Otherwise it took great pictures.I have now just purchased a  Powershot sx500.will be sure not to loan this one.will let you know how i like it when i get it

Reviews.Title: Annoying recording lens sound, but otherwise great~
Reviews.Author: H. Wang
Reviews.Content: As with most point and shoot cameras, when the flash is turned off, the photos come out grainy, but that is to be expected. My only complaint with this camera is that when shooting a video if you are to zoom in or out, the sound of the lens adjusting is VERY VERY loud and rather annoying. However the slight re-focusing capabilities of this camera when shooting a video are great, considering most point-and-shoot cameras don't do that. Good job, Canon.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I recently ruined the camera I was using--a Canon Powershot A3100 IS. I loved that camera and was sad when it was accidentally dropped and ruined. I was looking for a replacement and did quite a bit of research before settling on this model (Canon Powershot ELPH 110 HS). Most of the reviews for this model were very positive. I ran an online comparison between it and several other models and brands. I wanted a point & shoot because it's easier for me to use. (I have a form of rheumatoid arthritis) This camera is smaller than anything I've owned before, but I absolutely love it. One of the features that has impressed me and caught my eye on other reviews is the wide angle lens it possesses. This allows more light into each shot and the pictures I've taken so far have been impressive. They are crisp, clear, and the colors are extremely vivid. It's very similar to the Canon 3100 I owned, so figuring out how to use it has been a breeze.If you are looking for a great point & shoot that takes clear shots with relative ease, this is the camera for you. I'm excited to try out the video feature--I haven't had a chance to use it yet, but with the grandkids coming this weekend, I'll be sure to give it a good workout.

Reviews.Title: Quality pictures and video
Reviews.Author: wayne
Reviews.Content: The previous Canon camera was made from metal..this one appears to look like metal but maybe be a high density plastic...the screen is a big bigger....and the quality of the pictures and video appear to be good.  With regards to the case....if you drop it, whether metal or plastic....it may not survive anyway....it is light weight...does what you expect....my last Canon was great..but had some problem after one year of use....it was out of warranty...so to buy a refurbished one was the same price as the ELPH 110 HS...so it  was a now brainer...also using the Amazon Visa card...the savings was an additional $30.00 for card usage...It is exactly what you would expect....this is the third digital camera I bought from Canon...I still have the first one...and it still going strong...that one has a view finder...the newer models...more pixils...bigger screen....and changes in the casing....You will enjoy this camera...no problems...just do not drop it....

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Peggy
Reviews.Content: Perfect camera to replace using iphones with low battery life. The picture quality is wonderful. I bought this for my daughter and she loves it.

Reviews.Title: camera is perfect!
Reviews.Author: Zviadi
Reviews.Content: I have recently received camera and its perfect. I have tested it and it is very very high quality camera. it takes perfect full hd videos. it stabilizes image during video recording. Smart AUTO feature is working very well. taken pictures are very high quality and perfect. In complete dark in room it takes pictures like it is day. battery charger charges battery very good. charge time was approximately 1:45 hour. File transfer speed to pc is very fast.I also recommend to buy "Power2000 NB-11L Replacement Lithium-Ion Battery, 3.6 volt 900mAh, for Canon Powershot ELPH 110 HS Series Cameras" and "Case Logic TBC-302 FFP Compact Camera Case (Black)" with this camera. this case is very good too. it has additional little pocket.You cant find digital camera with 16.1 mp and Full HD video with this price (also I could not find this features on higher priced cameras too). I think this is better camera than its newer models.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING!!!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: This is an INCREDIBLE little camera. The QUALITY and CLARITY of the pictures and videos is just unbelievable. I cannot say enough about this camera...BUY IT!!! You will NOT regret it!!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Braden F.
Reviews.Content: This is an outstanding camera! It is durable, and built to last. I use this camera for some pictures but mostly for video and for chroma key. It takes outstanding video for what it is and using it for chroma key couldn't be easier. I would totally recomend this to anybody that wants a nice little camera for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Corynne Y
Reviews.Content: I like the picture quality on this camera. I felt that the material of the buttons felt a bit cheap (they wiggle, and seem too flat) but other than that it is a good point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: Alejandro Williams
Reviews.Content: muy buena y compacta, excelente tamaño. buen enfoque y captura......... recomendada muy manejable para congelar momentos importantes, es todo para una cámara domestica

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera
Reviews.Author: John Sane "Yarr"
Reviews.Content: Needed a new pocket camera. This one is quite amazing and a big upgrade in picture quality from 4 year old camera that I've been using up until now. Great video in 1080p, but the best feature IMO is the low light picture quality this camera gets. Along with the wide angle lens, this makes a for a great travel pocket camera. I personally do not like carrying around DSLRs with giant lenses all over the place.I've also gotten quite a few complements on the slick design of the camera as I've been traveling. The camera really feels great in your hands.I picked this up on sale for $100 a bit before Christmas time. For the price I don't think there is any camera that is comparable in quality.

Reviews.Title: My birthday present for me.
Reviews.Author: E. Cruz "Lifeguard girl"
Reviews.Content: Canon powershots are the best shoot and go cameras.  Their pictures are sharp and clear, and easy to work.  I love the color.

Reviews.Title: What an amazing little camera!
Reviews.Author: R. Greenberg
Reviews.Content: I like using this camera with the flash off. This camera is perfect for family get-togethers where you want to take a whole bunch of pictures without the flash annoying people.  The pictures come out beautifully.  Following the advice in other reviews, I turned the "auto" feature off.  It creates a delay when you snap the picture.  I took it on a trip to Italy and got some truly amazing photos.

Reviews.Title: Love the camera
Reviews.Author: G.Z. "bluViewer"
Reviews.Content: Love the camera (4.5 stars!) and all its different shooting scenarios, ie Fish Eye Lens, Color Accent, Miniature, very neat. Image quality is great. My only complaint about this camera is that the lens is too big and heavy for the body of the camera. The lens creates a small shadow in the corner of the image because it blocks some of the flash when shooting. This happens especially when using the macro setting because you are closer to the subject of the image. Also, if you set the camera down in between shots (which I do for taking retail pictures, constantly rearranging the products or backgrounds for different shots) it will topple over on the lens even on a flat surface. Other than these two minor issues, I love the camera and would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: simply awesome
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: I had a canon from prior SDH ELP 1400 and am very satisfied with it... This is definitely an upgrade over my last one, most specially in the recording where I now get a 1080... this is an awesome product, and definitely can recommend to all...

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Lois Turnipseed "S5107"
Reviews.Content: Bought as a replacement for a camera much like this one. This one is a bit more complicated, but the problem is probably me, not the camera. Pictures look good, what else is there to add.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful camera and easy to use
Reviews.Author: Paola
Reviews.Content: I love this camera because it makes a very good quality pictures and video. Very easy to use and in a very good price.

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera!
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: The camera is amazing! The recording quality is top notch and looks fantastic! The only draw back is you can only have 10 minute videos at a time.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 110 HS
Reviews.Author: Carol A. Nahoom "glassmyth"
Reviews.Content: I LOVE my this camera.  I photograph my kiln fired glass work mostly and the photos are great.  I would definitely recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: It's good for the price i paid for it.
Reviews.Author: Christopher Wilkie
Reviews.Content: Works good. I have yet to utilize it on vaccation and try all it's features, but it seems to be worth what I paid. I just have to get a decent size memory card to go in it since it came with none.

Reviews.Title: family picture
Reviews.Author: Leona M. Doyle
Reviews.Content: It is a great little camera.  It has taken memorable pictures that were mountable. I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot ELPH 110 HS 16.1
Reviews.Author: Janice Bartel
Reviews.Content: Just received the camera.  It was very easy getting started getting the batterie charged and setting time and day.  Very small and compact.  Looking forward to using it.

Reviews.Title: Love. This. Camera.
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: I had purchased this a while back in red and returned it because, at the time, it was video capture I was after. If you are looking for a camera that takes lovely pictures but is sort of lacking in the sound department when recording this is for you. If you are looking for something that records crisp sounds during video then look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera
Reviews.Author: Michael Huntsman
Reviews.Content: Great product. It arrived when I expected it to arrive and it was what I expected it to be, Thanks.

Reviews.Title: It's great!
Reviews.Author: Caroline Marx
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas and it is very nice. We will enjoy it for years to come.

Reviews.Title: my pretty pink camera
Reviews.Author: M. J. Reber "mjr images"
Reviews.Content: love this little camera!  I carry it everywhere!  I can't wait until summer to use the underwater housing at the beach and the pool!

Reviews.Title: So light and so many nice feautres
Reviews.Author: A. M. Place
Reviews.Content: I have had a Lumix until now and find this little camera almost as capable, certainly lighter, and 1/2 the price.  Now I can hope that it functions for years without the problems I had with the Lumix flash being finicky.

Reviews.Title: Great gift for son
Reviews.Author: BK
Reviews.Content: He has been enjoying this camera very much.  It has great features and takes fantastic photos.  He can't wait to take it on vacation next month!

Reviews.Title: Finally, a camera I can carry with me.
Reviews.Author: ChevyGuy
Reviews.Content: This does the job for me.  I've been looking to buy a smaller lighter digital camera and finally settled on the ELPH 110 HS. I couldn't be happier.  In a small padded case it is in my coat pocket, always ready to go.
