The bright red case makes it easy to spot so I don't tend to forget where I put it, and it does everything I want, (and probably more) with no fuss.  Very pleased.The screen is large & bright, the zoom control surrounds the exposure release, and it takes great photos in Auto mode.  Wow.

Reviews.Title: smal and feature packed
Reviews.Author: Jose L. Crespo
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures, love the blue case and it is so smail it fits in any pocket.  I love this camera.

Reviews.Title: Really like this camera
Reviews.Author: dh999 "dhaue"
Reviews.Content: I've always liked the digital elph line, but this one combines the Image Stabilization, the CMOS chip that does VERY well in low light situations (disclaimer, low light stationary, not a lot of movement), a very compact shape, and good MP and Zoom numbers.  I get absolutely fantastic quality shots in computer rooms without a flash, as well as with no-flash food shots in sometimes dim restaurants.  A great pocket camera that outshines any phone camera.About the only thing I'm not thrilled with is the move by Cannon from heavier metal camera bodies to plastic... yes, it is substantially lighter, and certainly cheaper, but I am curious about the durability.All in all though, I am without any regrets and would buy this one again in a second.

Reviews.Title: my dad loves this thing
Reviews.Author: ALK "AK"
Reviews.Content: I am no photographer but i used this for a few days before handing it over to my dad and I loved it. I have a entry-pro canon that i use and this thing does some stuff better than my rebel. Images are very crisp and it does great Full HD. I certainly would suggest this over the slightly cheaper models!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Paul Leyerle
Reviews.Content: Yah cool, great camera. If you're like me though and you haven't bought a digital camera in 5 years you will be unpleasantly surprised to find that they no longer hold images. Not even a teensy weensy one little picture. That's right folks unlike digital cameras of yore which could at least hold a small cache of photos this device is completely worthless without an sd card. What a joke! I can't give it a low rating though because the camera is good and it was shipped super fast. No picture taking tonight!

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: Brenda
Reviews.Content: We bought this as a gift and the receiver was very happy with the features and the quality of the photos.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Bruce Lee
Reviews.Content: I love it.Great picture in such compact digital camera.Easy of use is also plus.Lens cover seems too fragile.

Reviews.Title: is OK
Reviews.Author: Yeni
Reviews.Content: I was so excited to get this camera but was not impressed by it. I tried to use some of options that came with it for editing and don't seen to do it..so not that happy with it!

Reviews.Title: As good as the Youtube Reviewer's said it was
Reviews.Author: K. Dennehy
Reviews.Content: I'm not a camera buff and have no interest in becoming one, but I looked around before I purchased this and talked to some people as well. They directed me to the ELPH cameras and they were right: for my simple but serious needs, this is a great camera.

Reviews.Title: this camera handle the photo's speed is slowly
Reviews.Author: pei yin
Reviews.Content: Thanks for offer the nice service, even I am not completely like this product.For me, this camera handle the photo's speed is slowly. So i feel disappointed with it.Anyway, the provider do the great job.

Reviews.Title: Picture Quality is not good.
Reviews.Author: Satinder Kumar "Satinder"
Reviews.Content: I took some indoor pictures but did not like it. It's taking more time to take picture and they are not sharp also.

Reviews.Title: Love my PowerShot camera
Reviews.Author: Tony Dieli
Reviews.Content: Camera has been great for my wife and I to use.  Neither one of us are techno geeks, so the simple nature of the camera has been great for us.  Easy to use, and no longer have to fight the short battery life of our older digital camera.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: JIN
Reviews.Content: well, I think I like this product.It is working well, and I am satisfied with this purchasing.Thank you,

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: RHC
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with the size of camera, ease of use and quality of photos! Would definitely buy again! Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Great on the budget for the everyday Blogger & Vlogger
Reviews.Author: Santana
Reviews.Content: CurlyGirlBeauty.org & youtube.com/curlygirlbeautyI love this camera, its at a great price & great quality, perfect for making videos & taking pics. I notice when you record videos though the battery goes pretty fast,  So I think I will look into getting a better battery, yet this doesnt deter me from this camera.  Its so light, small & compact. Perfect to carry.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Toni
Reviews.Content: This is my third Canon Power Shot. I love them so much, I have worn them out using them so much. Would highly recommend this camera. It is compact, slides right into my purse or pocket and takes great picture.

Reviews.Title: Green Green Green
Reviews.Author: Mrlobsterbob
Reviews.Content: Did I mention its Green!! That was the only color I wanted as a gift. This works great and its super tiny. It has a large view window with a quick response.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Nick (711)
Reviews.Content: It is a better picture quality than most smart phones today, and you get to adjust settings a little bit easier. Smart phones are just more convenient, plus you can get an app that allows you to adjust the same settings.Most people wouldn't be able to tell the difference in picture quality with either camera.

Reviews.Title: Lots of features
Reviews.Author: Jesse K. Ocampo
Reviews.Content: If you're not very tech savvy person, this camera could take sometimes to get used to. I've had many digital cameras in the past but some of these features I had no idea what they were at first glance. But I'm not a heavy user, just a point and shoot kinda of guy, it's feels sturdy and survived 2 big drops from my clumsy hands.

Reviews.Title: A great camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: York Computer Lady
Reviews.Content: I was upgrading from a very old 4 MP camera. The quality and storage on larger GB SanDisks is very nice. This camera has a lot of functionality and the software that comes with it is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Convenient Little camera
Reviews.Author: deevee
Reviews.Content: This small, lightweight camera takes a good quality picture and videos.  I like the ease of transporting while sight seeing.  I clip it on my purse.

Reviews.Title: Great Pocket Camera
Reviews.Author: E. Kats "Tiger Cat"
Reviews.Content: I got this as a gift for my Mom who had the same camera for about 7 years which was so due for an upgrade! She loved the color and the size! I got it at a great price, and she is very happy with it so far!

Reviews.Title: Very low quality pics indoors no matter what
Reviews.Author: John C.
Reviews.Content: Had this camera for months now, I couldn't imagine why people are even giving this thing good reviews. I'm sorry for 16MP...these pictures are terrible indoors.I tried to keep my hands steady as possible and even used a tripod, but no I still cant seem to get clean pictures.I had a Kodak 8MP take cleaner pictures then this with my hands moving!!And of course the video is sub par.Its not at all complicated to operate, but I tried so many settings and lighting conditions(inside and outside)to get better results.So unfortunately the conclusion is the outdoor pictures are not too bad, but indoor pics are just horrible.Low quality product to me.

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot Elph 110
Reviews.Author: Gerijoy
Reviews.Content: It arrived just in time for my trip to Italy.  It's lightweight, easy to use and takes great pictures. I recommend this product if you want a camera that's compact and perfect for travelling.

Reviews.Title: Perfect P&S;
Reviews.Author: Jessica Keltgen "jessK"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this last year when I couldnt find my other small P&S; camera. After first I didn't really care for it but when I actually played with it and learned the settings I loved it. I took it to St Thomas this past year and honestly it did better nature, landscape, etc shots than my 1500.00 camera scroll to the bottom of this link and you can see examples [...]

Reviews.Title: Best camera I've ever owned!
Reviews.Author: Anya
Reviews.Content: If you want a professional-grade camera, but don't want to spend thousands of dollars on DSLR and complicated lenses, then this piece is for you. Even photography snobs would agree that this is a hidden gem in the world of digital shots. Canon is a classic brand, and this camera lives up to its name. The picture quality is outstanding at any time of day, even in low light. The camera has a lot of neat features that will make your photo-capturing experience a fun one, but it may take you a while to figure it all out - even a tech-savvy person can be overwhelmed by the new features. Battery life works well for recreational use, but if you're serious about your work, you may want to carry a spare. Love the compact size - very easy to transport, but be careful not to scratch the screen. Overall, this is a fantastic camera and I would recommend it to amateur photographers, as well as seasoned vets. This year's best kept secret: although they may turn their noses up, deep down they secretly crave the Elph!

Reviews.Title: CANNON POWER SHOT
Reviews.Author: Darlene Dominick
Reviews.Content: i LOVE THE CAMERA. i HAD BEEN LOOKING FOR A CAMERA THAT WOULD FIT IN MY PURSE ON VACATION. iT IS PERFECT.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 110 HS 16.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 5x...
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: Purchased for several reasons. Planning trip to do some snorkeling.  Purchase camera cause it can be placed in a waterproof case in order to photograph underwater. Camera takes good pictures and is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Perfect, affordable Point and Shoot Camera
Reviews.Author: Jill B
Reviews.Content: We have a high end, expensive digital camera, but I wanted something small enough for my purse or pocket that would take quick easy pictures.  I didn't want a camera that required me - or in my case- grandchildren to stand still.  I am very happy with this camera.  I was able to shoot 100's of pictures on one battery over the course of several days.  I bought backup batteries - and was pleased with the overall battery life and quality of photos.Now that my vacation is over, I still carry it in my purse and take pictures of wildlife and scenery.It's a great little camera for someone that just doesn't want to mess with settings, lenses or the bulk of higher end digital cameras.  I gave it five stars because it does EXACTLY what I needed it to do:  take quick and quality pics as a 'point-and-shoot'.

Reviews.Title: This Canon takes Amazing HD Video
Reviews.Author: MC
Reviews.Content: Even in low lighting The Canon Delivers full HD. For $140, This is the deal of the year for me.

Reviews.Title: GREAT product, GREAT pictures
Reviews.Author: Sally
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my husband, who kept taking and using MY Canon PowerShot.  My husband is a die-hard Sony-lover, but after he gave me my PowerShot for my birthday, he was totally hooked on it.  The quality of the pictures is amazing and the camera is fairly easy to use.  Plus, it's durable - I've dropped mine a few times and it hasn't gotten damaged at all.

Reviews.Title: Camera OK but the software....
Reviews.Author: J. L. Sanchez "Arnold C."
Reviews.Content: It's really a very good camera. Best there is. The software bad. They had a very good software on the earlier models. Even though is very easy to use... is just not worth installing it. Windows utility does the same thing.I used to have a Powershot A620 and the software not only downloaded the pictures from the camera it renamed them with a more recognizable file name, like "Sandras 2010 Birthday_01", Sandras 2010 Birthday_02", etc... instead of "img987601", "img987602", etc...Believe me it makes a difference when you have more than 25 pictures to download from the camera. Or when you see the picture files on your hard drive.

Reviews.Title: Perfect point and shoot pocketbook camera
Reviews.Author: SRF
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my wife for Christmas, and it has the perfect blend of simple point and shoot for her, and options to play with for me.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Marci
Reviews.Content: I had a camera that I didn't like, so I kept using my daughter's Cannon Powershot elph. I likes hers, so I thought I would splurge an get myself one, too. So far, I like it and it is much better than the Olympus that I had.

Reviews.Title: This is a great little camera!
Reviews.Author: theharvey
Reviews.Content: I researched quite a bit about different cameras before I decided on this one. I had a couple friends recommend this camera to me as well as the other reviews on Amazon and in other places. The camera is slim and light. It's not iphone slim but it's slimmer than most cameras. The low-light pictures look great as do pictures in any other condition. The camera's controls are easy and intuitive if you've had experience with digital cameras before. I put a good 16 gb sd card in it and there seems to be little delay between shots. Overall this is a great little camera and gets the job done. The one thing that could be nice is a touch screen but the model with the touchscreen was significantly more than when I bought it so I suppose it just depends on if that matters to you or not. This is a nice little camera!

Reviews.Title: Like the results
Reviews.Author: Regg Keyawa
Reviews.Content: Great size, great pictures, not to hard to manipulate.  Way more functions I will be able to master.  I guess that means always something to learn.

Reviews.Title: elph
Reviews.Author: G
Reviews.Content: so far so good still learning how to operate all its wonderful settings the pictures upload to the computer is very easily

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: KMF2678
Reviews.Content: Great step up from it's predecessor.  Functionality is a little easier and the LCD is bigger.  Very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Kenson
Reviews.Content: We gave this to her parents for Christmas and they love it. Very easy to use and takes quick, consistent, quality pictures. Truly a point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot
Reviews.Author: Chris Kline-Arko Electrical "Christine Kline"
Reviews.Content: I really like the camera but I thought it would have come with a flash memory card, but it did not!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent small point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Caggie
Reviews.Content: I wanted a small pocket camera for candid shots of the Grandchildren and for travel to Australia. So far the camera is performing well and takes great pics. The video quality is good and it's very easy to use. The annoying feature is that you do hear on the video the motorised noise when the zoom function is used whilst videoing. I bought a separate memory card and battery at reasonable prices, plus a pink case for $7 on another site that was recommended by a reviewer. I have just ordered 2 spare batteries for travel as the battery does need recharging frequently. Whilst I love my Nikon DSLR it's just too big for using to capture the children in candid shots as it's so intrusive - this small little camera is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Mediocre Quality
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: Good enough camera, but pictures taken outside in good light seemed really dark and lifeless. Maybe would be better for indoor use. The photos also were not too sharp. The fact that the camera is fully automatic is very limiting too. Go for a more advanced point and shoot, like the Canon Powershot SX150IS. Doesn't cost that much more - and is much better quality, plus lets you control things like aperture and shutter speed if you are not interested in investing in a DSLR quite yet.

Reviews.Title: Finally, a lightweight pocket camera that's worth taking with you!
Reviews.Author: C. D. Payne
Reviews.Content: For years, I've been looking for a small and light camera to carry daily. I have the Canon S100 (good camera), but it's a bit too bulky and heavy for a pants pocket. I tried several of those thin cameras with internal lenses that operate via a prism, but was disappointed in the photo quality. Other small cameras I've tried just didn't cut it. This Elph, however, fits all my needs. The lens is extremely sharp and the sensor captures very fine details. Even highly magnified, the image looks like a crisp photograph, not a smeary watercolor. The operating controls are well thought out and easy to use. I don't know if this camera is being closed out, but I found one new for under $115. I suggest you get one while they're still available. Definitely a winner!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: dwjensen
Reviews.Content: Although I own an expensive DSLR, I have found this camera to be an important part of my photographic arsenal.  It's small, takes excellent images and 1080p video.  Combined with a backup battery and a 64gb memory card, it's a winning package.

Reviews.Title: Nice palm or pocket size camera.
Reviews.Author: S. Churchwell
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a replacement gift based on the performance of the earlier 300 ELPH HS.  It is an amazing performer for such a small compact camera.

Reviews.Title: Does a good job
Reviews.Author: bradley s wilson
Reviews.Content: Other than some fringing when shooting under some indoor lighting conditions, I find this to be a very good P&S.;

Reviews.Title: Packed with technical advantages.
Reviews.Author: Trebor "Trebor"
Reviews.Content: I've read professional reviews that criticized this camera for things that are not relevant for why I bought this camera. I wanted a small camera with a 24 mm wide angle lens and fast f/2.7 aperture which I could slip in my jeans pocket when I am hiking. It has a 16 mp sensor which gives images great detail and can be enlarged while retaining sharpness. High ISO images lose a little detail, but for my photography I want detail at normal ISO. It's just something you accept when you pack 16mp onto a small sensor; high ISO noise. It's not noticeable until you are at 800 ISO and above. The images are sharp and colors vibrant. It also goes beyond auto mode and enables the user more control in program mode. Battery life was criticized, but I find the battery life quite acceptable. If a larger battery was used that would necessitate a larger profile camera which isn't why I chose this particular p&s.;The full HD video is beautiful and has a dedicated button to turn it on and the zoom can be used when using the video. Canon is the accepted leader in point and shoot cameras and this Elph 110 hs reinforced that fact very well. I also have a Canon G9 which I love, but unfortunately doesn't fit in my pocket when I'm hiking :(

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Dom
Reviews.Content: Perfect portable camera. Takes great pictures. I love the manual exposure and ISO control and the screen is very vibrant. Video is great too, though there are no manual video settings, but it's very crisp and clean. Best $150 camera I've ever purchased.

Reviews.Author: Pilar Rey
Reviews.Content: The best customer service ans the canon power shot is excellent., pictures are beautiful colors and easssy to carry  :-)

Reviews.Title: Great Quality, Simple Camera
Reviews.Author: Ricardo G. Cepeda
Reviews.Content: I got this for my mom, who is very technology averse; she wants something simple that has one button for turning it on, one to take a picture, and one to see the pictures she's taken...this fits the bill perfectly!  It still has some powerful features, but no dial that can accidently get turned and then mom doesn't know what to do.  She even started taking videos with the dedicated video button!You can set the auto features on and then hand it over to your parents or grandparents and let them just take pictures!I paired this with the Eye-Fi Connect X2 wireless card and set it up so that when my mom's computer is on and the camera is on (all she has to do is turn on both) the pictures get transferred....a little slow with big files, but totally worth it since she doesn't have to fumble with the little card, the reader, getting to the right drive, then copying them over to the right folder.  I was able to get a smaller card (4 GB) since she can transfers whenever she wants.Oh yeah; the picture quality is great too!

Reviews.Title: MY HUSBAND LOVED IT!
Reviews.Author: AXGD "A. G."
Reviews.Content: HE LOVED THAT IT IS SO LIGHT AND THAT IT WILL BE EASY TO CARRY ON ANY OF OUR TRIPS.

Reviews.Title: beautiful pictures
Reviews.Author: Colleen Whitlow
Reviews.Content: I'm no camera expert or photographer, but the quality and clarity of the photos is exceptional. I really like the camera, and once I learn how to use all of the features it will be even better! Overall, I'm very happy with it and feel that it was a good purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great camera.
Reviews.Author: Ross C Teague
Reviews.Content: My wife loves it and finds it easy to use and says it never takes a bad picture. Great camera.

Reviews.Title: fantastic product
Reviews.Author: Felipe Sosa
Reviews.Content: Epic photos. Easy to use. Long battery life. Compact so you can take it anywhere. Definitely a must buy. Love it.

Reviews.Title: This is a great camera.
Reviews.Author: Richard S. Cosgrove "goatboy43"
Reviews.Content: Really quick delivery, crisp photographs, easy to use.  My only complaint is that they changed the recharging thing.  No improvement was necessary and I was happy with the earlier model.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Linda Bireley
Reviews.Content: My Olympus camera is around 10 years old and was running so slow I decided that it was time for a new camera but didn't want to spend a fortune, don't have a fortune.  I decided on this camera from the reviews and it is great.  The pictures are very good and it is very easy to use. I love it.

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: Will R.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera as a replacement for a fujifilm one I bought and returned a week before. The cost was significantly more, but was absolutely worth it. Love the camera, photo quality, and features.

Reviews.Title: Cute
Reviews.Author: melissa "fancy"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. I wanted a smaller one than what I had before. I like how it comes in different colors. I got a small camera case for this and love that as well. Great purchase and fast shipping!

Reviews.Title: good .
Reviews.Author: Jose Saldaña
Reviews.Content: everithing was ok I am agree whith this product .. . . . . . . . . . .

Reviews.Title: Great camera, Great Value, Thrilled
Reviews.Author: Brian Lord
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera on eBay, to replace my aging Cybershot. There was nothing wrong with the Cybershot, just wanted something with a beefier MP rating. Also, the Cybershot had an internal lens and the internal lens' can sometimes result in grainy pictures and red eye...SO, this is a improvement.ANYWAY, I like this camera. Takes great photos! No grainy, even in low light, great price. My 32GB SD card goes in and will allow me to take a million photos. The controls are easy to use, the screen is high resolution (means I can tell if its a good picture as soon as I take it). Its SMALL! SO SMALL! I thought my Sony was small! This is smaller than a deck of cards and lighter!What I don't like: its cheap feeling. plastic, and I'm ok with that, but cheap feeling plastic. I took my Cybershot all over the world, including deployments to the Middle East, and it saw all the action that might imply. I dropped it more than a few times and it continued to work without issue. I don't know if I can drop this camera.Time will tell, I suppose. But I would recomend this camera. Especially for the price. Great for someone who wants something just a step above their smartphone.

Reviews.Title: Sweet little camera.
Reviews.Author: William Mary Ward "Woodchuck"
Reviews.Content: At this price, you can't expect to get a view finder.  Takes very nice photos anyway.  I use it all the time.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Donald Eric Hancock
Reviews.Content: Light weight and easy to carry.  Ton of functions and modes.  Photos very satisfactory. Miniature mode a lot of fun.Canon makes good stuff.

Reviews.Title: The camera is perfect for me.
Reviews.Author: Todd Slusar
Reviews.Content: My last camera was a Canon PowerShot so when it came time to replace it another PowerShot was a no-brainer. The picture quality is very good. It is lighter and thinner and I like have more of the features automatic. This camera is perfect for anyone who just needs a good camera. Simple, easy to use and compact.

Reviews.Title: Ridiculous for the price! Excellent...
Reviews.Author: Peter A. Johnson "Uli"
Reviews.Content: For the measly sum of somthing like $125 I got this little thing. This is the third compact digital camera I have owned from Canon. All have been excellent, tough (many drops and falls with no effect), and take excellent pictures. This latest entry in the ELPH line is even better photographically. More powerful and flexible focussing schemes, better light balance, and higher sensor resolution. The optics are top-notch for a compact camera. For those of you who still think that your Phone-I is a camera, let me give you a reminder - REAL cameras have lenses. Try buying an inexpensive camera like this and you will see what I mean.I also own a digital Rebel (actually, I won a couple of them), and for simple photography, this ELPH produces pictures equal to the quality of the more expensive Rebel. When there are more demanding applications, the Rebel still outdoes most cameras on planet Earth, but this ELPH thing is amazing. Hard to imagine this can be so good for such a low cost.

Reviews.Title: Great camera at a super price
Reviews.Author: Dave Jr
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera for mom for Christmas. The image quality is excellent, it is simple to use (mom-proof), and it is very small, slipping easily into a pocket or purse. I liked it so well, I might pick one up for myself.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: texas
Reviews.Content: exactly what I needed. Easy to use and it came very quickly. 8 more words required yum yum yum yum

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Xinyi
Reviews.Content: A great camera at this price. I took it with me on a tour this winter, and it performed well, especially for people who doesn't know much about digital things, like me.

Reviews.Title: Great camera...
Reviews.Author: Barbara Huffman de Belon
Reviews.Content: We're very pleased with the functionality of this camera - -both the photos and the video. Could capture with the video is also very good.  Glad we bought it!

Reviews.Title: My daughter loved it! Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Lois M Arnold
Reviews.Content: This is a very good camera. Easy to use, and takes great pics! With a push of a button I can record. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Canon still makes awesome cameras
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Canon PowerShot camera and they just keep getting better. This takes high quality shots in both manual and auto modes and allows you to have a lot of flexibility in manual mode. The reason I gave 4 stars and not 5 is the reason I had to buy this camera. Canon's Elph cameras have a problem of breaking if the lens is justled or dropped when extended. This cannot be fixed for a reasonable price.Despite this issue, I still bought a new Powershot Elph because I love the pictures it takes.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Johanna
Reviews.Content: One of the best cameras I have ever had. It takes really good pictures and its a really good price! The color is what it is on the pictures

Reviews.Title: Small & Lightweight
Reviews.Author: katie
Reviews.Content: Very small and lightweight and takes quality pictures. The color is a little darker and brighter than shown, but it's a very pretty blue color.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Ronald V Shelby
Reviews.Content: I love the form factor of the ELPH by Canon.  This is the 3rd ELPH I've bought over the years.  With the updates to the lense and photo capabilities the photos and videos just keep getting being.  Thanks, Canon.

Reviews.Title: THE BEST CAMERA DIGITAL!
Reviews.Author: caromape
Reviews.Content: A month before buying this camera I bought a Nikon COOLPIX S6300 16 MP Digital Camera and sucks ... and this camera is just the opposite. Take great pictures and video ... I love the color

Reviews.Title: Love Canon PowerShots
Reviews.Author: E. Knight
Reviews.Content: Needed a cheaper point and shoot camera while backpacking in Nicaragua, so I bought this knowing my other ELPH had taken awesome shots... Really wasn't expecting what I got out of a camera that cost so little compared to what i've bought in the past.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, great size.
Reviews.Author: Dennis G. Bledsoe "Wrench"
Reviews.Content: Once again Canon sets the standard.  This was a gift for my wife, who really loves it.  Especially the low light ability it has.  Clear shots.  We aren't camera experts, but I depended on others' reviews for my selection.  The grandkids look great in the pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Meg
Reviews.Content: This camera was bought as a Christmas present for my "technology-challenged" mom.  As a result, it was very important to find a camera that was easy to use - the buttons are easy to see, big enough to press/turn for arthritic hands, large screen to for viewing, and intuitive usage for the standard "point-and-click" camera to give clear, fantastic photos.  It is a vibrant red, compact and durable. My mom was thrilled to receive this little camera - definitely a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Elph 110 Point and Shoot
Reviews.Author: Md News "Jimmy da Fish"
Reviews.Content: I needed a small camera for times when my other camera- a Canon SLR was too big to tote around. This Elph is fine. Resolution was better than I would have expected from one of these "Point and Shoot" units. And the battery holds a long charge. Recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Yellow tint
Reviews.Author: TZ
Reviews.Content: My son bought this camera for us from Bestbuy for Christmas. It is a camera full of features. We were looking for something to replace our Kodak V550,so a quick point and shoot pocket camera. In auto this camera seemed to take very good pictures in low light and outdoors. But we found for indoor pictures in auto with the flash it would create a strong yellow tint.  If I went into settings or shut off the flash it seemed better but then the lighting was variable. So long story short if you are looking for a quick point and shoot to use in all auto be wary of the tint. Exchanged it this week for Sony DSC WX50 which seems to be be doing quite well.  TZ

Reviews.Title: Canon Loyalist
Reviews.Author: M. Croome
Reviews.Content: I tend to stick to the same manufacturers for years on end once I find a good fit of customer service, functionality, etc. Canon never let's me down. This is my 3rd elph/ixus and am very pleased with the latest.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Marilyn Shanahan
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift for my boyfriend. He was schocked as he never expected it. He loves this camera as it's small and very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: All I need.
Reviews.Author: Marc
Reviews.Content: Top notch point and shoot camera.  High quality, lots of features and easy to use.  I would highly recommend this camera for someone looking for a compact, quality, point and shot camera.  I also have a Nikon D600.

Reviews.Title: Canon Camera
Reviews.Author: James A. Ridgway
Reviews.Content: We use Canon cameras at our school and find them very dependable.  They receive daily use by a multitude of staff.

Reviews.Title: New camera
Reviews.Author: Spa56
Reviews.Content: I give this a rating of 4 stars it's small, maybe a tad too small,  neat , simple to use , the controllers are easy to navigate , the stills are clear and clean , as are the movies the microphone is my main concern , sound is not to good , overall a good camera for the price

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera for my daughter
Reviews.Author: meklein
Reviews.Content: I needed a small, decent but not over-the-top little camera for my daughter.  She is starting to enjoy taking pictures and I don't want her using my professional equipment.  This seems like a good started camera.  I was not expecting much, but that being said, it has exceeded my expectations.  Good color on the pictures and while easy to use, does allow her to use a few settings, which is a good experience.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: isaac davenport
Reviews.Content: Bought for my gf for christmas. so far she ha sreally liked it. Takes very good pictures, easy to use. no complaints

Reviews.Title: Great outdoors, tough with indoor light.
Reviews.Author: AngelKnuth
Reviews.Content: Pros: This camera is fun and stylish. The blue exterior makes it easy to find in your purse or bag and it's small enough to fit in your pocket. In outdoor settings this camera is at its best. I'm still working through the multiple amount of settings on manual but so far Auto has performed better than expected, often choosing the right scene to shoot with based on the people in the photo and the surroundings.Cons: As with most point and shoots in this category, the difficulty comes in low light situations. Flash tends to be a little overpowering and I often get a yellow tinge in the photos without using flash. Of course, nothing that can't be corrected in Photoshop. Though the case is blue and beautiful, the lens cover feels cheap.Overall, I'd buy this camera again. It's a good point and shoot to carry along if I don't feel like lugging around my Canon SLR and captures good pictures on the go.

Reviews.Title: Power Shot Camera
Reviews.Author: Candis Westby
Reviews.Content: The seller sent the article within 5 days and it was wrapped and under the tree for a Christmas present.  The camera is exactly as described and it is being enjoyed. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great Compact Camera!
Reviews.Author: GDW
Reviews.Content: This camera compliments my photographic needs by providing a compact alternative to carrying my 35DSLR around with me. I can take this camera anywhere as it is very compact, but the image quality, the quality flash, and ease of use make it a great camera. I recommend it to anyone!

Reviews.Title: gift for daughter
Reviews.Author: dans
Reviews.Content: this was given as a gift and my daughter had requested this model. She has been very happy with the camera.

Reviews.Title: Point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: Diane
Reviews.Content: What a great little point and shoot camera. Takes great pics with little to no effort. Easy to use and glad I got it.

Reviews.Title: Compared to Lumix, Nikon
Reviews.Author: Salvador Barrera
Reviews.Content: This was the third camera I bought since the my previous Lumix SZ7 and Nikon L610.  I was looking for a camera that would be able to take pictures of my fast moving kids under low light.  The Lumix took blurry pictures but the Nikon performed worse and resulted in 90% of unusable pictures even when making all adjustments of scenes.  The Canon performs well indoors and takes great pictures.  I have always like the color tones of Nikon and I do think that the Nikon take great quality pictures when taking stills.  The Canon Elph 110 surpasses both cameras mentioned above when it comes to taking pictures in low light.  This may be that the flash seems a bit brighter but I never compared the three together.  I believe the Lumix comes in 3rd place here for me since it took blurry pics and the quality/color was not as detailed as the Nikon since I took comparison pictures between these two cameras.  One thing that is a deal breaker is the Canon's SMART Auto.  I had to fiddle with many scene setting with the Lumix and Nikon but the Canon has it all figured out for you and allows you to put it on Auto and let it do it's work.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Stefanie
Reviews.Content: 16 megapixels. This camera takes amazing photos, is compact in size, and I love the touch screen! I would definitely buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 110 HS
Reviews.Author: SHARK BAIT
Reviews.Content: ARRIVED QUICKLY.  GOOD PRICE AND TOP QUALITY AND EASY TO USE.  PHOTO QUALITY EXCELLENT. DOWNLOADING IS EASY TO USE.  DON'T LET YOUR GRANDCHILDREN PLAY WITH IT THOUGH.  cAMERA DOESN'T HANDLE DROPPING WELL.

Reviews.Title: for Canon Powershot ELPH 110 HS 16.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Ferdinand Molina
Reviews.Content: its a good camera with excellent mega pixels. Sharp pictures. so far i like it no complain so far. Easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the $$$$
Reviews.Author: R. S. Novello
Reviews.Content: I've owned quite a few Canon PowerShots and a couple have been disappointing but this one is all around excellent.

Reviews.Title: A great little camera
Reviews.Author: Melissa M
Reviews.Content: This is a great deal, a great little camera!  If you are looking for a good digital camera to cover the basics this it.

Reviews.Title: Great small size, but too much delay before picture taken
Reviews.Author: S. Laverentz
Reviews.Content: I remembered very quickly the complaints from my friends who use these types of cameras- the delay before the picture is taken ... Usually the moment you want captured is lost, especially when trying to photograph animals. Oh well, I like the small size and the picture quality when I finally get a picture worth keeping.

Reviews.Title: nice little camera!
Reviews.Author: memeklo
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a camera that would take better pictures of my little grandkids who are always on the move.  I thought this was it - but it isn't.  It's better than my older camera, but the shutter speed is still to slow for them!!  I have since been told that the only way to have that instant shutter is to spend a LOT more and have to deal with settings etc.  It does take some nice videos.  It's capable of HD video but when we downloaded the HD onto our computer and viewed them they looked jerky-- and looked normal after we had them compressed.  What a pain that would be to do every time!  After that we found a setting in the camera to change the video so it was not taking them in HD.  Works great, looks great.  Also realized that using the camera in manual mode instead of "auto" works better for most things.  There is lots for me to learn yet on this camera but I think it is good value that should be great for what I need in a camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Diane Woodington
Reviews.Content: Value for the price is outstanding.  Takes wonderful pictures and has many features for special effects. Really like the ability to recharge the battery.  Comes with the charger which is a plus.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Sally K. Carmichael
Reviews.Content: It is still new and I am still learning the details but so far, so good! I plan on using it and enjoying it.skcarmichael

Reviews.Title: For the Price hard to Beat
Reviews.Author: Dogman
Reviews.Content: Bought just before Christmas and took on a trip. Have been using a Nikon L20 for some years and figured I needed an up grade. I'm very happy with this buy. Have compared on Snapsort and the L20 got a 25 & the Canon 110HS got a 63. Seems to be a nice buy if what you are looking for is a good clear picture. I didn't need and don't want GPS or touch screen etc. I compared the other ELPH cameras with the 110HS and they didn't rate as well. Why spend hundreds more for a camera that does not take as nice of pictures. I figure if it works out of the box on the 1st charge it should be a good one. I have read where they were dead out of the box. Seems this is how everything is made these days. Sort of a crap shoot. Was looking at the S100 Canon but by the looks of them there is something wrong. They came out at $495 a year ago and are as low as $245. The S95 is still $350 or more. Is this telling us that the S95 is a better camera? My 110HS is probably a better camera for clear shots than the S100.

Reviews.Title: Really Great Pictures!
Reviews.Author: Averagemom
Reviews.Content: I've had several Canon PowerShot ELPHs over the years, in different series. My daughter took my last camera with her to college, and I wanted a new one for the upcoming holidays. I've always liked these Canon cameras, so I looked at what was available, and their prices. I think this one is my favorite of them all. Light-weight, easy to hold, simple to use, AND . . . it takes great pictures, which is really what I'm after. The downside? My daughter used it at Christmas, and loved it!  I had to say "no," I'm keeping THIS one!

Reviews.Title: Better than the old model by far
Reviews.Author: James Carlson
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for a friend to replace their old powershot. It had horrific autofocus and was worthless. This new model is superb as all the photos we get back from her are sharp, clear, vibrant and amazing.

Reviews.Title: Awesome little camera!
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my husband for Christmas, and so far it has been an awesome little machine. It takes beautiful photos, has some really cool features, and really it is just an all-around great point and shoot. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Pineapple Juice
Reviews.Author: Taco Burner
Reviews.Content: Got this for my girlfriend to replace the one that was stolen from her. She loves it. I finally did something right for once!

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: S.. E. "Cubbiefan"
Reviews.Content: This camera shoots very nice pictures.  The zoom works very nicely.  I especially like that this camera has a battery that charges.  I bought this for my daughter and like the concept of the charging battery, so I asked for a camera also.  My camera was bought at Costco.  I got the camera, memory card and a carrying case for the same money that I spent on Amazon.  Although at Amazon, I was able to pick a color.  So read carefully--the memory card is NOT included. I had missed that, but again the camera takes very nice pictures.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely LOVE this camera!
Reviews.Author: Lisa Gergets "Lisa Gergets"
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera because I gave my old Canon SD880is to my brother and bought a bigger, better camera. Now, I don't use the bigger, better camera at all because it's just too cumbersome. I'm not trying to create art, I just want to snap great shots of my kids and surroundings!This camera is incredibly lightweight, will absolutely fit in a pocket when we're out and about, hiking, traveling, etc. and that's really what I need. It also has HD video capability which is AWESOME and with my 16GB memory card, I have around 10,000 pics I can take without  filling it up. I plan on getting a spare battery too, so I don't have to worry about that when we're on vacation etc.All in all, love the Canon brand, and I'd recommend this camera to anyone wanting a simple to use, point-and-shoot camera for their everyday pics.

Reviews.Title: It is slower than I expected.
Reviews.Author: Lillian Schlachter
Reviews.Content: It takes too long for the screen to recover after taking a picture. Not alot of choices of scenes e.g. sport or landscape.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Isaac
Reviews.Content: Canon cameras are the BEST  I really like this one and all the cool effects that have like the color accent and vivid color

Reviews.Title: Easy to Carry & Easy to Use!
Reviews.Author: Judy
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased as an alternative to my Canon T3 - for those times when it's more convenient to carry the camera in my pocketbook.  The pictures seem to be good, zoom is also good.  Only concern was that I expected better photos during low-light situations & that is not typically the case.

Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: Mauricio Morales
Reviews.Content: Beatifull, small perfect for a fast need, no complains at all, i will recommend it. i love cannon cameras, thanks

Reviews.Title: Good camera.
Reviews.Author: D. Casey "dmek69"
Reviews.Content: It's a Canon. These are great little camera's with plenty of pixels for any type of user. Takes really nice pictures and I haven't even begun to use all of the feature sets yet. This was a present for my girlfriend. She loves the color and was very impressed by the gift too. Thanks,

Reviews.Title: Good camera, not super impressed though.
Reviews.Author: Margaret Guitron
Reviews.Content: There are a lot of cool little gadgets to enhance your picture......but I found as an inexperienced photographer, I found it hard to focus in on images when taking pictures. My pictures easily came out of focus many times .....could be because I'm still getting the hang of the settings though.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera!
Reviews.Author: W. Schumacher
Reviews.Content: Very compact camera that takes high quality pictures. Very easy to use for novice photographer. Good investment for picture opportunities.

Reviews.Title: Cannon Wins!!!!
Reviews.Author: Philosophical Lizard
Reviews.Content: This is my second Power Shot.. The first was a joy (still is) and this is even better. I bought it for my wife, who has been envious of mine for quite a while. It is a reliable, easy to use on Auto, flexible and superb little camera.And it takes pictures which are so much better than any cell phone that it just isn't on the same planet comparison-wise.

Reviews.Title: amazing camera
Reviews.Author: Emily
Reviews.Content: i love this camera, the color is such  vibrant blue and the pictures come out amazing and crystal clear.  i would defiantly buy again

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: A. Williams
Reviews.Content: I would definitely recommend this camera. I bought one for my mom and she loves it! The pictures are very clear.

Reviews.Title: I love the fast refresh and can snap lots of shots quickly
Reviews.Author: Hannah Hunter
Reviews.Content: I am a canon powershot fan. This is my third one over the years and have loved them all without any problems. I chose this one because I wanted to be able to shoot quickly in nature and not miss a shot. WIthout the flash the refresh is amazing. I can set it on continuous shoot or single shoot for a shutter not so sensitive. It take really good shots and even smaller than my last one and thin and light. If you want a small great camera, this is it.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: swingkat "swingkat"
Reviews.Content: Good little camera. Arrived on time and well packaged. Light and easy to take anywhere. I have enjoyed using it so far.

Reviews.Title: just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Lucille Alzamora "pandalucy"
Reviews.Content: Handy, small, sharp picture; easy to use, crop, flash, zoom range, and self timer;  with Canon's reputation behind it.  yes!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Daniel Ritter
Reviews.Content: I have only had this camera for a couple days but the pictures are great and the HD movies are phenomenal.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Toni Tigar-Carter
Reviews.Content: Getting better using in, first camera for years. Loving how I can make great photographs, computer ease wonderful!!. Love it.

Reviews.Title: Compact Camera
Reviews.Author: Enlighten
Reviews.Content: This compact camera seems to pack the punch and takes a very nice photo.  Not hard to operate.  Would purchase again.

Reviews.Title: Takes great pictures
Reviews.Author: LInda G
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and takes great pictures. There are a couple of things that I haven't learned yet but the picture quality is good.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: S. Venkatraman
Reviews.Content: This camera is good and small. Picture clarity is amazing and it delivers what it promises. Have not tried out the other functionality yet, but will update when I do

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: ROBERT SCOTT
Reviews.Content: Got this camera as a pre-Christmas gift. Used it to take photos of the Christmas lights,cool. Just remember to get some SDHC memory.

Reviews.Title: We love it.
Reviews.Author: Gary Squarepants "Tech - Resolution Nut"
Reviews.Content: This has exceeded our expectations in every way. The photos are great even having come from a nine year old. The Black Friday deal made this affordable, plus if my camera breaks I can steal hers. :-)Just wish it had a case included.

Reviews.Title: Great Little camera
Reviews.Author: R0
Reviews.Content: Camera takes excellent pictures. Good fast focus and nice wide angle makes it a nice gadget and the size makes it a truly wonderful buy.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 110 HS 16.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 5x
Reviews.Author: E. Stoner "Book Bug"
Reviews.Content: I have the big pro Canon with L series glass. This camera is just wat I wanted, a camera that is so small you can carry it with you all the time. The L glass on my pro camera weighs 20x the weight of this camera.  and the macro is allot better than I thought it would be!

Reviews.Title: PERFECT CAMERA FOR ME
Reviews.Author: pathfinder
Reviews.Content: Lovvvve this camera: ease of use, quality of pictures and video are amazing.  Not wild about the camera but picked it so it wouldn't blend in with all the other silver ones.  I have a little problem keeping up with my camera so this color really stands out.

Reviews.Title: A great Christmas gift for my mother.
Reviews.Author: Yoshi
Reviews.Content: She loves it. I love it. This camera is easy to use, 20x zoom, shoots in HD...Even the 20x zoom is crystal clear... that I was shocked about.I'm going to be getting one for myself soon.I prefer this one over the updated model as the updated ELPH is a touch screen... this model has a few basic buttons and is very simple to use.So far, so good. Cannon, you've done a great job with this model. It's cheap, beautiful and the LCD screen is huge in my opinion. More than large enough to enjoy the photos you've taken.

Reviews.Title: I Love it..
Reviews.Author: Punna Reddy
Reviews.Content: Images quality and Video quality are superb... I gifted this to my cousin... they loved it ... Simply Superb....-:) .. So easy they can handle and simple to carry...

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot 110hs
Reviews.Author: Marlene Mondragon
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for only a few days and shot about a hundred pictures of which less than 10 have come out clear.  I have tried shooting in automatic mode as well as other modes.  The pictures of the pets are OK since they are fuzzy anyway.  The flash is bright enough if you are less than 8 feet away.  The pictures indoors are very red in color.  The shutter lag was very slow in tracking mode or with the flash.  Unless the subject is perfectly still the images blur. It doesn't seem to be broken but save your money and use the camera on your phone.  Maybe my expectations are too high, but I would expect better pictures from a very inexpensive camera.  I am not very tolerant of the narrow depth of field in this camera.  I returned it.

Reviews.Title: Good gift idea
Reviews.Author: karthik
Reviews.Content: A good camera to gift people who like to carry a camera in their purse/bag and snap pictures on the go. I gifted this to my Dad for Christmas so that he can take pictures when he is travelling. Low light pictures are not that great. Canon is well known for its limited options making life easy for the non-SLR crowd. Worth the money I paid for.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: Can't go wrong, especially for the price.  Love the color, no more guessing which camera is mine at family functions.  Takes really nice photos.

Reviews.Title: Just what I need.
Reviews.Author: smf
Reviews.Content: I have owned this camera for about a month now and I absolutely love it. I am getting ready for a 5 week trip to Asia and I wanted something small and light that will travel easily. This camera is all of those things and takes amazingly clear photos. I love everything about it and super stoked that I could get it in different colors (I chose black). I've used it in low light and have taken tons of photos of my fast-moving puppy and all the photos have turned out great. I'm really looking forward to using it abroad. For the price: $129.00, you're getting a fantastic deal... not sure what more you could ask for.

Reviews.Title: So far impressed
Reviews.Author: Single Male 37 "hoopster"
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace a lost ZX3.  This camera takes pretty good 1080p video.  The pictures are okay compared to my T2i.  Seems to have considerable lag after taking a shot.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Marie O
Reviews.Content: This camera was a replacement for my old Fuji Film and is a great point and shoot camera for any of those on-the-go moments. Very happy with my purchase; as well as, the ETD.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 110 HS 16.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 5x...
Reviews.Author: Lilia
Reviews.Content: Hola Feliz día,Esta cámara es extraordinaria, la nitidez con que toma las fotos es muy buena, los colores vivos!!!En las opciones de fotos con efectos no tiene mucha variedad, sin embargo, eso pasa a segundo plano, cuando se observa la calidad de la imagen.Mis amig@s me han preguntado donde la compre? porque les ha gustado también!!!Recomiendo este producto.Caracas-Venezuela

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Joseph
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife and she loves it. I'm not a photographer or expert on cameras so I will leave the in depth review for those who are, but I can say that it takes terrific pictures and videos. It is also very easy to operate and lightweight to carry.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Tazzio
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the price. Just a little disappointed that it didn't come with a sd card. Other than that it's great camera.

Reviews.Title: too noisy
Reviews.Author: C
Reviews.Content: I couldn't get passed how loud it was to zoom in and out... I'm returning this and looking into different canon cameras. I haven't heard any camera zoom as loud as this one!! Some people wouldn't mind the zoom being so loud but I mostly use cameras in social situations, and the zoom noise would be distracting.

Reviews.Title: Great little travel camera
Reviews.Author: David L. Vancil "rhetor"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my wife mainly for travel, and we used it for the first time at our family gathering for Christmas.  I am impressed with the sharp photos and the ability of the 110 to account for the problems of bright light from a window behind a human subject.  The auto feature does a fine job of deciding when to use flash.  Coupled with the case we got from Case Logic, the camera seems secure and extremely portable.  I am not a fan of LCD as the only way to frame a photo, but the screen on this camera is wonderfully bright, and I am expecting that it will work just fine outdoors.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful - Excellent
Reviews.Author: Don M. Compton II "bingo625"
Reviews.Content: I have many Cannon and Sony cameras and my new Elph 110 HS is now my favorite.Battery life for flash pictures was much better than expected. I thought there for a while it would never run down.The lens is wide angled and conducts color almost perfectly. The pictures are crystal clear and the flash does a remarkable job of providing good light everywhere in the frame.Only a few years ago you couldn't get this level of technology and picture quality without spending $15,000. or more.This is a great studio camera or outdoor and travel camera.The controls are simple to operate and intuitive in their function.If you don't have this camera.... get one. It will lighten your camera bag and improve your picture qualityEnd.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Jee King
Reviews.Content: It is good price and my mother loves it.  I bought it for the mother's day.It is good price and my mother loves it.  I bought it for the mother's day.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Joe Chung "Joe C"
Reviews.Content: Fast shipping and great item do far! I will update periodically.Lightweight, simple to use, loads of features and enhancements!The price of the item you get a great camera quality and not to mention full HD function which is an ideal feature from this cameraIt would be nice to be able change aperture and shutter speed, but hopefully one day they'll introduce this function for point for point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: It takes too long to take a picture
Reviews.Author: W. He
Reviews.Content: It is a too simple camera. It takes very long to take a picture. So it's hard to catch good moments if you want to have more than one photo.  The delete function is embedded in menu so you have to press several times in order to delete a picture.

Reviews.Title: perfect for our intended use
Reviews.Author: wfrey34112
Reviews.Content: This camera was everything we want in a camera. Very user friendly and compact enough to fit in a pocketbook or shirt pocket yet takes really good quality pictures. We are very pleased with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Perfect camera
Reviews.Author: Rob O'Leary
Reviews.Content: Takes excellent pictures and is very easy to use.  If you need a compact camera this is the one to purchase.

Reviews.Title: I love my new camera
Reviews.Author: Elisabete Schramm
Reviews.Content: This is a very small caamera that suits my needs since I'm a Grandmother and love to take nice pictures of my grandchildren.Easy nice and simple to manage.

Reviews.Title: S far it works great
Reviews.Author: Amber
Reviews.Content: Pictures are clear and it takes a good video. I have not had enough time to really explore any of the other features. The lighting on it is not super

Reviews.Title: nice budget camera
Reviews.Author: W. H. Thum
Reviews.Content: love it. it has all the basic functions plus unexpected features. take nice picture at low light, high image stabilizer, easy to use. recommended for leisure use.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Wendy Peters
Reviews.Content: Love this camera, nice features and easy to use. Takes good pictures like a pro camera. Shipped quickly and packaged well.

Reviews.Title: High quality footage for small camera
Reviews.Author: Rachel C.
Reviews.Content: It's small and compact, but takes awesome photos and videos. Just wish it had come with a case, we had to find a generic one online.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I was looking for.
Reviews.Author: Wayne J.
Reviews.Content: I am a fairly experienced photographer.  I own Nikon film and D SLR equipment and an assortment of lenses,  several generations of Nikon digital P&S; type cameras and an earlier A series Canon.This very small camera has the big advantage of a totally auto (and very competent) full "just push the button" mode as well as some very sophisticated programming options.  It satisfies my "gadget freak" tendencies as well asmy wife's "just let me take a picture" wants.Complaints about shutter lag, etc. are IMHO, mainly due to not understanding the camera and how it works and should be set up.  Many may not realize you can take the next shot WHILE THE CAMERA CONTINUES PROCESSING THE PRIOR SHOT.  That and mode selection make the complaint moot. IMO.Like it a lot and picture quality is excellent for a fixed lens, subcompact zoom.  I attribute lots of that to the fact the zoom range is reasonable and not an extremely wide range of focal lengths.  The compromises in extreme zooms make quality suffer.For the $129 price I paid, hard to top!

Reviews.Title: Great value, make sure you pick up a separate memory card!
Reviews.Author: Vallynn
Reviews.Content: Amazing value for the casual user for the money! Make sure and pickup a separate memory card when you purchase the camera so you can use it right out of the box. I saw some other reviews that were not happy about this, it didn't bother me because the tiny little cards that come with most cameras are a joke anyway. Bright, large screen for viewing, easy to use menu. This may not be enough camera with enough control for an advanced user but great for anyone under that skill level!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my last trip to the beach!
Reviews.Author: Just An Opinion "from a regular guy"
Reviews.Content: The combination of this camera and the waterproof housing (Canon WP-DC330L) works perfect!  The camera takes great photos and the case works perfect in the water (and makes the camera to float).All the controls of the camera can be used with the case on.  It was cheaper that buying a waterproof camera and, according with other reviews, the camera takes better photos.

Reviews.Title: Works, but...
Reviews.Author: J. Lin
Reviews.Content: It's a good entry level point-and-shoot, and the image sensor is pretty good, but the quality is not where I'd like it.  There are a lot of image processing/setup issues regarding taking pictures in different environments where I get blurry pictures or really strange white-balance.  If you set everything right, it's great, but it takes a lot of settings to get there.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: HeartofAvalon "abellygoddess"
Reviews.Content: We had an older model that we loved.  We bought our daughter the new Cannon Elph and loved it so much, we had to upgrade ours as well.  Sharp focus, easy to use, and great pictures to share memories!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: LBell690
Reviews.Content: I needed a point and shoot for my work. It had to have good resolution and a good macro lens. This is great. I wish it was a bit heavier for 1 handed use but otherwise more than meets my needs. Easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Tammy
Reviews.Content: For a small compact camera i love it.  Get great videos and pictures!!  Would recommend camera and sender to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent.
Reviews.Author: Rodrigo Reis
Reviews.Content: Very good video and photo quality. Very small so you can put on your pocket. The zoom is also amazing, both on photo and video.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Incredible
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: I own many Canon's and this lives up to its name. This is used in conjunction with an Ikelite case to capture 1080p underwater video during our dives.

Reviews.Title: Canon ELPH 110 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Westfall
Reviews.Content: Love, love, love this camera. I've had other cameras that were too complicated or just too bulky to carry around. This little camera is tiny, yet takes some great wide angle shots.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera, could be sharper!
Reviews.Author: Jerry Joerling
Reviews.Content: Overall this camera met my needs for a easily pocketable, convenient companion to my Canon DSLR.  My only real dissapointment is that pictures of people, particularly grandkids, do not appear sharp.  Too much emphasis is put on camera shake, and consequently the use of high Iso settings to decrease exposure time.  The noise is very noticible if flash is not activated.  Having used point and shoot cameras before, and comparing the ELPH 110 HS to a Lumix SZ7, I feel the 4 stars I gave the ELPH is appropriate, and it is a nice addition to my camera family.

Reviews.Title: Very good point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Steven T. Kearney "roguetrex"
Reviews.Content: In planning a trip to Disney World I was looking for a replacement (for my older Elph 750 from about 6 years ago) that had HD video capabilities and optical image stabilization. My Droid cell phone was unreliable, and takes too long to start up (not to mention the fact that it rarely saves the footage correctly). Canon has a great history and reputation, so I purchased this 2 days before our trip.Positives:-This is an excellent point-and-shoot camera, especially for snapshots of people.  The wide angle lens really makes it easy to quickly frame up.  It also lets you stand fairly close to the subjects, which is a real treat (I kept thinking I would need to take the standard "3-step-drop" back to fit everyone in the frame, but I can't remember doing that once.-HD Video quality for the most part is gorgeous and wonderful, even in some lower-light settings (see negatives below for some less-great things about the Video Quality).  For a point and shoot that can fit in your pocket, I am very impressed.  For the most part, the best advice is to keep it zoomed out wide, and you'll love the images.-Great photos, especially in daylightNegatives:-It takes some time to focus sometimes (mainly in moderately low light, but sometimes in normal lighting).  When it does auto focus, it is quick and precise, but when it doesn't quickly lock on it has taken about 7-10 seconds of me repeatedly trying the shutter button half-way down for it to "lock" focus correctly. Again, this doesn't happen often, but maybe every 100-or-so shots it will, and it isn't a problem I've had with many cameras.-Standard battery leaves a lot to  be desired.  I purchased a 3.6V and 900mAh Wasabi replacement battery, which is now my standard.  If you're planning to be out taking photos (and, especially, videos) for a full day, I would recommend purchasing (2) of these replacements, and carry the standard battery as final backup.  I found it under $14, and have seen them under $10.-With HD Video, it takes a very long time to focus once you're recording. I learned quickly to let the camera focus (just like when taking a photo) before you start recording.  Sounds obvious, but if you want to record a moment quickly, its worth holding off for that last second while the camera focuses, because once you are recording it is slow to re-focus.-With such a wide lens and the optical image stability I was disappointed at the number of photos that were blurred.  That is somthing that I was hoping to avoid, and I took small measures to try an avoid that, but I expected a greater improvement from my old Elph from years ago with no IS.Miscelaneous-The zoom is fairly slow once recording video, but that isn't a huge detriment.  Just something to know going in.Bottom line, for a $130 camera, this is a real bargain.

Reviews.Title: So Far, So Good!
Reviews.Author: Laura T.
Reviews.Content: So far, I'm really loving this camera. I feel like I made a good choice.Originally, I purchased the ELPH 320 thinking I wanted the WiFi, but quickly returned it for this one after remembering all of the issues I had with a Nikon touchscreen camera.It's very small, which I think is my only complaint (most people don't complain about the smallness, but I like something solid in my hands so I won't drop it).There are a ton of great features in this camera, both manual and automatic. It takes really great pictures (I own several SLRs and a step-below a DSLR Canon). I haven't used the video on it much, but I don't take many videos, if any.Overall, I'm extremely happy with this camera. It seems like a very good value for what the camera does.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: H. Baker
Reviews.Content: Many programmable techniques, easy to use, small with large screen, amazing zoom. My only complaint is that a few weeks after getting it, we went on vacation to Walt Disney World. The 3rd day there, a line appeared in the screen. It's not on the pictures but all the way across the screen. That is disappointing. But I didn't get the protection plan.

Reviews.Title: great price
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: worked with camera loved it but had taken to long to catch the pix. shame because has really nice features

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: Erick
Reviews.Content: I read reviews and watched videos about this camera and knew it was nice. Now that I have it all I can say is that it is a very good camera and films clear video. I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Versátil
Reviews.Author: Rosalbo
Reviews.Content: Una cámara compacta con excelente prestaciones, diseño y estilo, excelente para viajes y cualquier otro evento familiar, especial para personas con pocos conocimientos defotografía...

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: jenny neuwirth
Reviews.Content: my daughter is thrilled with her new camera she cant stop taking pictures with it and it works great highly recommend

Reviews.Title: Fun size camera
Reviews.Author: Farmgirl
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera so that my husband and I would each have a camera.  We have a Canon Rebel which is the best but I purchased the powershot for my pocket because my husband doesn't share the Rebel very well on vacations plus it is a bulky camera compared to the powershot.  This camera is fun to play with, just point and shoot and is pocket size.  The pictures are of decent quality but does not compare to the quality of the Rebel.  I would recommend this camera just becasue it's fun and little but if you want really high quality pictures invest in a Canon Rebel.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Paul R. Lumley
Reviews.Content: Small, great pictures, reasonable price, much better than the photos I take with my cell.  Good selection of colors also

Reviews.Title: Really nice camera
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: I wanted to replace my old Canon Elph with a new version.  I really like the 3" screen and it takes good pictures.  I like the auto feature that you don't have to mess with trying to find which setting you need when taking a picture.  I'm not no professional photographer and this makes it real easy especially when your in a hurry to get the picture.  When taking videos when zooming in and out it does record the noise but overall I am very pleased with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful
Reviews.Author: TrueMe "CapitalTen"
Reviews.Content: Great camera.  Well made, looks durable. Excellent results.  Bought this in exchange of a Nikon S6300 which I hated.  Canon - buy it with closed eyes :-)

Reviews.Title: Great camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: I am a big Nikon fan. I only by Nikon cameras. I was looking for a waterproof camera to bring with me when snorkeling. I tried many waterproff rugged cameras from Olympus, Panasonic, etc. but all have failed me. Then Nikon came out with thier own waterproof camera, yippee! But that failed me as well. So i decided to go with the waterproff housing route and it worked out great. This little camera works great on it's own but use it with the Waterproof housing, you have a great waterproof camera!I highly recommend this to anyone on a budget looking for a good compact camera. Add the waterproof housing and you can take it in the water as well.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera, got it to replace an earlier ELPH 8 MP.  Did not disappoint!
Reviews.Author: Donna McArthur
Reviews.Content: Perfect camera to take along to the football game and any other event.  Easy to operate, good pictures, and lovely color.

Reviews.Title: birthday present
Reviews.Author: Faith
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband as a birthday gift.  We have another cannon power shot that he uses and I wanted him to have his own.  This model makes videos at a better dpi and works well.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Bsby
Reviews.Content: Good but not great, but for the price, It is better than expected.  First the negatives. I found the controls to be confusing and difficult to navigate, particuloarly in sunlight.  it is hard to tell what mode you are in and the screen gets filled with icons, most of which are unintelligible.  It is very small, which is good, but also very easy to drop, which is bad.  I found that you always have to use the wrist strap, otherwise you risk disaster.  I also found that the lens is very prone to flare, which in some cases ruined my scenic shots.Now for the positives:  it is small and convenient, fits in the pocket and always there when you need it.  It takes excellent snapshots, and works very well in low light.  The flash is powerful enough for most situations, but because of the high ISOs available, I found I often didn't need the flash and was able to get beautiful natural light photos.  Lens resolution, for a camera of this size is excellent, and the natural rendition of color is great.  I also found that the high resolution (full HD) movies you can take with the ELPH are far better than I expected,  better, in fact, than I shoot with my SLR.On balance, I would recommend this camera to anyone who wants to take great snapshots, and wants convenience, great color, and high resolution.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Quality Pics and Easy to Use!
Reviews.Author: Shelly S
Reviews.Content: I have owned several point and shoot cameras and this by far is the best one I have owned.  The picture quality is outstanding and other than cropping I don't have to do any other enhancements.  I also find this camera very easy to use and I know there is a lot more to offer if I actually sit down and read the owners manual!

Reviews.Title: good picture with low light, but broken in 1 week
Reviews.Author: P. Pratt "Phillip"
Reviews.Content: I love this little camera, very small, its very small. and solid, buttons are little hard to press, cause too small. screen is hot HD, pic quality is pretty good, wonderful with low light. fast focus. But the lens just stick out stuck there  doesn't move at all. have to return it in 1 week use, like so many people's experience

Reviews.Title: Took Great Pictures
Reviews.Author: pratap
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my relatives and they were really impressed by it. I am also planning to buy this one.

Reviews.Title: Favorite companion!
Reviews.Author: M. Amer
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my wife.  She loved for being compact and loaded with features.  My wife uses it especially to maintain all the memories and different sites she sees in her travel overseas.  Very nice product.  By the way our son (a Businessmaqn) recommended it.

Reviews.Title: Point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Lisa M. Roberts "LRoberts"
Reviews.Content: The Cannon Elph has always been my favorite camera.  It is so easy to use and shoots great photos.  This camera offers a variety of great features too.  Can't beat the price or quality!

Reviews.Title: Good compact camera
Reviews.Author: Aadi
Reviews.Content: If you're not an expert level photographer that like to play with settings and just need a good quality camera that's simple, efficient and compact, look no further. Love it :)

Reviews.Title: love this camera
Reviews.Author: ch
Reviews.Content: I haven't put this thing down since the holidays started. Very easy and efficient to use. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a good camera.

Reviews.Title: MUST HAVE CAMERA
Reviews.Author: brian
Reviews.Content: I just received this camera a few hours ago and i have got to say, this camera is amazing ! The pictures are very nice and clear, the video is amazingly clear. I love this camera so far, it has really impressed me ! ill be doing a review on it and putting it on YouTube. Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: Good For the Cost
Reviews.Author: Santa
Reviews.Content: I researched alot of Digital Cameras and read many, many of the reviews before deciding to purchase this one.  I actually bought 2 of them for x-mas gifts.Keeping in mind that they were not real expensive cameras, I didn't expect anything too extraordinary.  After arriving, I checked them both out to make sure they worked good before x-mas.  The batteries actually charged quicker than I expected (about 2 hours).  The cameras do not come with a memory card, which I knew, so I bought one with the camera.  I played with the features briefly and took a few pics.  The auto focus worked good, and the pics seemed pretty clear.  The zoom worked good indoors.  I don't know how it would work outside zooming on something far away...  my trial shots were taken indoors.  There is a small delay between pushing the button and when the pic is actually taken, plus another small delay before the pic is shown on the viewing screen.If you want a camera with a real quick response time, this one is not for you.However, as a x-mas gift for 2 teenage boys, this camera should be more than sufficient.  Especially since I got them for around $130 each.Also, since this camera does not take regular batteries, I bought an extra for each camera.  If the battery for the camera dies, it would be good to have a 2nd one charged and ready to go.  Even though they charge fairly quick, a 2nd would be very handy, and they are not that expensive...  I got a charger and 2 batteries for around $20.A little slow on taking and showing pics...  wish it took regular AA bateries...  wish it came with a memory card....Overall, a good camera for the novice photographer (a.k.a. teenagers).  If you are looking for more...  spend more money and get a top of the line camera.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Joe Kassa
Reviews.Content: the camera is very clear and easy to learn. I love the size and the easy buttons on it. I will recommend to any one who is looking for a small quality camera

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: Russ L. Hopkins
Reviews.Content: We needed a camera that was small and easy to use. It has performed perfectly for us. I would recommend getting at least a 4 SD card if you are going to use the video.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 110 HS
Reviews.Author: Kayaker
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my new ELPH camera. We have a new baby granddaughter, our first, so naturally I want to take pics of her whenever we see her. The quality has been great and when taking them in less lit areas, I now get a good photo!  I am a person who takes a lot of pics whether it be family, holidays, vacations, etc. so the performance of the camera is very important to me. Would I personally recommend this camera to others...definitely yes.

Reviews.Title: Unbeatable for the price
Reviews.Author: Sara
Reviews.Content: I shopped around and read reviews for several days before settling on this camera. If you're looking for a point and shoot with great results, this is it. I've added some sample shots of my own, all pictures taken with no flash.Really, this camera is great. Great functions/settings and even the auto option works well enough in good lighting. Low light is pretty decent for this little camera, and it has settings to help with that

Reviews.Title: canon elph 110
Reviews.Author: iak
Reviews.Content: Very good Camera, sharp pictures and nice colors, Canon is a guarantee. The only small cons are the keys which are rather difficult to touch and the battery life which is poor.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Brittany A. Storey "bstorey1010"
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this camera to anyone! It has very clear picture, easy to use, great quality, and multiple, easy to access set-up options. The pictures print with great color as well. I love the zoom and automatic timer features!

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: A. Sharma
Reviews.Content: It is a good cam and good value for money ... Nice Results for the price of the camera... !!!

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot
Reviews.Author: jerseygirl
